You already know it's not going to be horrible like your nightmare. It'll be calming and soothing, just the thing you need after such a stressful experience." You smile nervously. She was serious about this. She wanted you inside that big belly of hers and then somehow out of it again. Maybe you were still half asleep, but some part of your brain actually considered it...
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: You wake up, Johanna is trying to soothe you.

1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
Against your better judgment you nod at the orca woman. Her concerned grimace brightened into a huge smile. Perhaps all of this hardship would have a happy ending. Johanna thought deeply, milling over her options. She decided that it was best to involve you in the decisions as well, since it would be your first time.

"If I'm going to let you stay in my belly, maybe it's smart to shrink you a little bit. It makes the swallowing easier and my stomach will be more roomy too." She made it sound like a relaxing vacation. You still couldn't quite shake the idea that a trip into her body was a one-way affair. Thankfully, as though she could read your mind, the whale addressed the issue.

"Regarding your exit, there's two options. Either you come back up through the mouth or you take the long way. The latter will require you to shrink quite a lot, so I think we'll save that for some other time. The moment you come out I'll catch and wash you." The level of detail in her planning made it very clear that Johanna has had this on her mind for a long time. There would be no backing out. She'd either be inconsolably sad or she might just get angry enough to stuff you down her throat regardless of your approval. Were you really going to let her do this?

She saw your doubts and spoke calmly. "If you're getting cold feet about this, I'm fine with pushing it forward a little bit until you're comfortable with the whole ordeal." She was giving you one last way out. You had but to confirm it and she'd keep you warm and snug outside of her belly. But you felt like you'd gotten too far to quit now. She was going to do this to you some day, no use in delaying it any further. Her actions and words have filled you to the brim with confidence. You trust Johanna when she talks about getting you out again. It would be so easy for her to just laugh it off and digest you. But she was far too caring for you to ever let that happen. The orca woman got up and retrieved her shrink ray. The dials were set to half your stature. The familiar warm glow enveloped you and the world around you grew. She sat down next to you and her large hands grabbed your sides. Her touch was amazingly delicate, like you were suddenly make of fine porcelain. The juxtapose between her towering stature and tender grip is mindboggling. Gently she pulls you into her lap, where she cradles you. The orca softly coos at her new tiny man-friend. Fishy breath washes over you, making it hard for you not to ruin the moment with the sounds of disgust.

You felt her large orca snout press against your torso. Johanna was nuzzling with your shrunken form. Slowly nuzzling turned to licking. In spite of her best efforts, she simply had to comment on your taste. It was divine. And completely conscious too. Not like those mindless drudges. You begin to wonder if one of the reasons she's so adamant on keeping you alive is so she can do this more then once. Her large, warm tongue slathers you in orca slobber. It was slimy and stunk of old fish much like her breath. Between licks she asks one last time. "You ready?"

With determination you nod your head and the whale maw opened wide. Her thick gullet looked plenty big enough to devour you at normal size too. Her jaws were lined with bright white teeth. None of those were needed for this meal as she lifted you up. The whale ever so gently deposited you on her stuck out tongue, bringing your shrunken form inside of her humid maw. The fishy stench grew a hundred times more powerful as the huge jaws closed. You made sure to keep your legs away from her teeth, causing a minor giggle to rise from the throat just ahead. "A tip." Johanna muttered to her little friend. "Try to hold your breath when the swallow comes." You had no idea what it meant until the large tongue began to push you towards her throat. Every stale burp ever made by humanity couldn't compete to the stench inside her throat. Your legs were the first to be carried to their little summer retreat. Quickly following were the remainder of your legs and lower waist. The powerful gullet squeezed around you, hungrily drawing in more of your body. The slimy tunnel just beyond was almost invitingly warm. You could tell Johanna had to fight herself to keep your descent going slow. She wanted you to be able to follow what was happening and not panic. The fears you felt before were still present, but her warm maw and soft tongue helped subdue and control them.

You put your hands to your sides, letting them slip into the gullet and giving up your last method of resistance. From this point on, Johanna was in charge of where you were going. Her tongue gently pushed you further down her throat. She hummed with pleasure, relishing the feeling of a living man about to take the plunge down her neck. When only your head was still in her mouth a loud gulp quickly pulled in the last of you. You were now sliding down her throat and into the stomach. This would be the moment. Either she was right and you would be fine or this devious whale had just tricked you and would now digest you. You had faith in Johanna that it would not end like that. After what felt like an unnaturally long slide you feel something open at your feet. You slide into a large fleshy sack, the walls lined with strange luminescent spots. It was strangely beautiful and lent more credence to the fact that her stomach could do these weird, alien things she talked about. You were deposited in a small puddle of slime. Immediately you noticed how your exposed body showed no reaction to the stuff. It was clear the goop wasn't caustic as one might expect in a stomach. You breathe a small sigh of relief, happy that your trust in Johanna is rewarded.

"Well, this is certainly unexpected." You mutter to yourself. "They always say that." A response echoed through the whale's body. "Wait, you can hear me?" You said, slightly alarmed. "I can sense you inside of me, little human. It's like sight, sound and so much more combined." You calm down a little. Your surroundings are a lot to take in. You reach out and touch one of the glowing markings on the stomach wall. "Oooooh..." Johanna moaned. The wall shivered a little, inspiring you to lay down. You spread your arms and legs, letting the whale 'feel' your whole body against her insides. All your surroundings shook and suddenly twisted, throwing you against what used to be the wall but is now the floor. The orca woman had laid down on her back on the couch. Her tongue was hanging out and her breathing irregular. Her eyes glazed over with joy. "You learn fast, little man." She cooed between breaths before asking: "How do you feel?" You couldn't believe you were about to say this. "I feel like I've been afraid of nothing. The softness of your stomach, the strange calmness of it. It's hard for me to describe the feeling, but soothing would probably cover it best."

As though she was able to read your mind in there she pre-empted your next question. "If you want to be let out, ask me any time. The moment you don't feel like being in there, I want to know. Understood?" You smile and reply. "Understood, but I don't think I need to be going anywhere anytime soon." Johanna pats her belly contently and yawns. "Well, dinner is still a few hours away. What do you want to do?"
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: accept her offer

choices: you sleep under her big body.
You sleep in her roomy belly.
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
"I can start with getting used to this." You say with a smile. Johanna echoes your smile and sighs deeply. The first time is always a rush for both her and the human. Part of her wondered if she was going soft. Normally she'd have stuffed him down her gullet on day one just to prove he'd be fine. But this human, the resistant one, there was something about him. She'd grown up all her life knowing human servants. None of them came near feeling as enjoyable as this one. And he hadn't even stopped yet. She felt your every movement against her soft stomach lining. Your finger tracing the luminescent rings dotting the inside tickled ever so slightly. The stomach shuddered in delight.

The orca woman's hand gently pressed against her belly, deforming your fleshy room. The malleability of your surroundings was strange to observe. The large hand could press down on the soft stomach so much it pinned you down. No small feat in such a spacious room. She rubbed up and down, the stomach walls pressing into you and squeezing you in thick layers of soft flesh. It was in equal parts disturbing and relaxing. The strange smelling slime inside helping to lubricate the whole process. Time went fuzzy as the gentle internal massage continued. Slowly the weight lifted but you were barely able to keep your eyes open. You join Johanna in a well-deserved nap. A few minutes couldn't hurt, right?

Suddenly your surroundings shifted again. Minutes had turned into hours and it was dinner time. From all around the whale's voice rang. "It's a good thing I can sense you sleeping. Otherwise I'd have gotten really concerned about your lack of movement. Now just sit tight, dinner is almost ready." Your belly rumbles, you haven't eaten since this morning. The larger belly around you rumbles too like an amplified echo. A tinge of fear runs down your spine. "Hah, great bellies think alike." Johanna jokes. Her chipper attitude leads you to believe all is still safe inside. With the same happy voice she asks: "You wanna stay in there for dinner?" Now you're plain confused. "How's that gonna work? You can tell your stomach what to digest and what not?"

"You can't?" She dryly answers before continuing on her question. "You can help yourself to my meal as it accompanies you." The thought alone makes you feel a little sick. Politely you decline her offer. "No thanks, I prefer chewing my own food." The whale silently smiles before grabbing the counter and heaving a little. With great control over her body she pushes you back up her throat and into the sink. A quick splash cleans off the worst of her stomach juices. She carries you to the dinner table, now richly adorned with large plates of food. You both tear into your meal like it was going out of style. For some reason you were feeling as hungry as ever, even after eating yourself almost comatose this morning.

The night rolled by with some movies. One from Johanna's collection and a tv showing of Independence Day. You both have a hearty laugh at the dated scenario, making light of the fact aliens did actually take over the Earth. Movie night was satisfying and with a big yawn the both of you long for a good night's sleep. Johanna looks around shiftily before leaning in and whispering softy: "You know, my belly can be a bed too..." Yesterday the very question would seem so out of place, but now you're giving it some serious thought. Ultimately you both agree on...
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: stay in

1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
The thought of a belly bed was too absurd not to try. Johanna sat with you on the couch and leaned close. "You know, it'll be even snugglier in there at your normal size." You'd almost forgotten she'd downsized you for your first time. Now the choice was yours. A bigger belly or a tighter one. Either had their merits and you find yourself debating the better option for a long time. Eventually the orca woman gets impatient and prods you for an answer. You opt to go for a full-sized belly visit. Quietly Johanna confides that those are her favorite too. The shrink ray is quickly set to reverse the effects and with a passionate gaze the whale eyes you up.

"I'll need you to help me out a little for this. Just try to crawl inside as much as possible. My big body will do the rest." Her voice was comforting like a warm blanket on a cold day. With two uncertain hands she lifts you up and brings you into her open maw. A little more hesitation this time, but Johanna persists. She plants your head at her gullet, which readily opens up and begins to swallow. All the internal passages are so much tighter than before. But with some persistence you manage to cram all of yourself down her throat. The orca woman has noticeable difficulty getting you down into her belly. You remember her advice and begin to crawl further, actively seeking to be lost even deeper in her body. It sounded like so much madness just days ago, but now you can't get enough of it.

A loud slithering slurp announces your entry into Johanna's stomach once more. It feels a lot more cramped this time. It squeezed you from all sides, almost naturally pushing you into the fetal position. She walks calmly up the stairs and lies down in her bed. Your world is sloshing back and forth, eventually resting on its side. You lie down in the harmless, warm slime pooling at the bottom of her stomach. You could feel her entire body slow down and fall asleep. You soon follow her fine example and drift off inside the whale's belly. The next day you awaken from the most refreshing night of sleep you've ever experienced. For the first time in days you've been able to sleep without concern. You laugh a the observation that you've been afraid for so many nights that she might eat you. Who'd have thought that the moment she actually did you would willingly let her. When the belly around you begins to shudder you feel Johanna wake up too. It is clear right away that you weren't the only one whose shoulders have shed a huge weight.

Without even having to ask the whale sits up in her bed and works you back up her throat. You are caught in her strong arms and quickly licked mostly clean. "Good morning little man. It's Saturday today, you know what that means?"
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: You sleep in her roomy belly.

choices: She wants to sit on you
She has a game in mind
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
"I've got all day to play with you!"

At first you were a little scared, but you found yourself dreading this idea less and less every passing moment. Were you really beginning to get used to her constant manhandling of you? Or was her affection making all of this seem remarkably friendly? Perhaps you're on to something there. Were it not for this crazy whale woman you'd be huddled all alone somewhere in a dark alley, fiercely hoping nobody would find you. Yet here you are. Warm, well fed and rested and held closely by someone who cares deeply about you. The only thing you have left to wonder is the caliber of games she had in mind. Though having now spent a full night in her belly without any negative side-effects was encouraging.

"First off, I didn't get to do this tonight, so let's quickly..." She didn't finish her sentence. Instead she laid back down on the bed, grabbing you in a soft hug. Your head was pulled into a comfortable rest perched atop her boobs. You try to remember what activity she's referring to. But when you realize what it was it is already too late. Johanna quickly rolls over and smothers you beneath her. With a smile and a giggle she grinds herself back and forth, rubbing her smooth skin against your back. The weight of her body holds you pinned, reducing your options to pathetically wiggling. You dutifully start your futile task and her reward is quickly noticeable. She lifts her arms and legs, letting even more of her mass smother you directly. After a few seconds she releases you again, rolling onto her side and spooning you. The heavy smothering makes place for affectionate hugging as she holds you in this overwhelming embrace. Neither of you move or even say a word. The moment is too pleasant to disturb. Finally you clear your throat and she sits up again. With a comical pop your head is pulled free again from having been pressed deep between her breasts.

"That was a good start of the day." You both mutter nearly at the same time. Realizing the coincidence you look at eachother and burst into laughing. Her whole body shakes and jiggles, Johanna loosening her embrace. "Let's get some breakfast in us." She suggests. You nod fiercely and you both head downstairs. You enjoy another round of the orca's delicious cooking. She takes you to the living room and sets you on the couch. She sits down next to you, putting her shrink ray on the table. Her heavy weight makes you slide towards her, leaning against her large flank.

"What to do, what to do..." Johanna murmurs with an ominous giggle.
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: "We're going to play all day."

choices: Johanna wins, she gets to re-enact Godzilla with you
you win, you're allowed to watch a movie perched in her cleavage
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
You suggest watching a bit of TV while she makes up her mind. Johanna agrees and flips on the television. Whatever program was on just ended and the inevitable commercial block starts off. Johanna was about to switch the channel when a movie trailer caught her attention.

"Godzilla is back!" A deep voice echoes. "The citizens of New York have never seen anything like this!" You're not sure if this is just a bad comedy spoof or a really cheesy movie. But you look up to see the orca woman strangely enraptured by the action on screen. When Godzilla stomps a whole column of tanks flat she shudders a little. You begin to worry about her and all the ideas this trailer is giving her. It ends with a bombastic shot of the famous monster roaring. "Godzilla 3: America is Next! Out in cinemas now!"

Johanna didn't need any more time to decide. She turned the TV off and looked at you with a big smile. You gulp a little bit. You both saw the same trailer and you didn't need to guess who was going to be playing the part of the giant monster here. She could see the concern in your mixed expression. "I think you and I both have the same idea for a game, don't we? That Godzilla has nothing on the mighty Johanna. Now we just need a tiny citizen to run and hide from the big scary monster." She eyed the shrink ray with a mischievous glare. But before she inevitably shrank you, she asked you one very important question.

"Before we start, are you reasonably convinced that being shrunken will not make you really fragile? I'll dial up the resilience so I can step on you without any problem." You gulp at hearing her say those words. In her mind, flattening a little man underfoot was already certain. The idea of being smothered under those huge monochrome feet was off-putting. With hesitation you reply. "I guess... but do you have to step on me?" Johanna laughs, patting you on the head. "Only if I find you. We'll play hide and seek. With you shrunk down there'll be so many places you can hide." her enthusiasm didn't fill you with hope. You quickly fire back at her. "Alright, but no using that nose of yours. I can't hide from that." It hadn't even crossed the orca's mind yet that she'd probably be able to sniff out the little human. She solemnly pledged to just look for you normally. "But if I find you, I get to do the Godzilla thing. You've got to run away shouting and I try to step on you." You laugh nervously and agree. "But what if you can't find me?"

"If you can stay hidden for five minutes I'll let you watch a movie with me." That sounded a bit underwhelming. "Is that it? I risk getting squashed flat for a movie?" Johanna smirked naughtily at you. "Oh, you stay tiny and you can watch it from anywhere on my body. Maybe you want to lie on my big smooth belly. Or maybe you want to be tucked in here..." She pointed at her impressive cleavage. Now there was a prize worth playing for. Her excitement was infectious and you hop onto your feet. "Alright, game on. Shrink me!" Johanna grabbed the shrink ray and fiddled with the dials. A quick shrinking later you found yourself a towering three inches tall. Your height matches that of the orca woman's pinky finger. Each of her now huge feet was easily three times longer than you were tall. Suddenly this idea seemed a whole lot less smart.

"Okay, you have until the count of ten." You quickly interject before she can start. "Actually, could I have a minute? My legs seem to be a little short right now." With a big laugh the orca agrees and starts counting to sixty. You dash away, running for the large speaker tower in the corner of the room. With only seconds to spare you hide behind the imposing wooden column. It was a bit dusty, but hopefully this would keep you safe for the next five minutes. You wanted to peek around the corner to see what the whale was up to, but you thought better of it. Heavy footsteps meandered back and forth, the large orca woman searching thoroughly for her little human. The idea of chasing him around and playfully stepping on him was too amusing not to try. But she'd have to find him first. Who wins this game of hide and seek?
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: She has a game in mind

1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
Johanna was starting to get a little frustrated. Three minutes had already passed and not a trace of her little human toy in sight. She was tempted to use her keen sense of smell to track him down, but that wouldn't be fair. Maybe three inches tall was a little too short for hide and seek. With time running short she paces around the living room faster and faster.

You have hidden well behind her speaker tower, but your heart is racing. Those huge footsteps seem to pass by closer and closer every time. You dare not peek out lest you give the whale a chance to find you. You did not want to get up close and intimate with those huge stomping feet. Whenever Johanna walked by your corner of the room everything shook a little. Time was running short and soon you'd have your victory. A movie of your choice viewed from the best seat in the house, her soft tits. Already you are trying to remember the longest movie you've seen. You wonder if the orca woman would be into Lord of the Rings. Your thoughts were interrupted when she accidentally nudged the speaker tower with her hip. You were scared straight back to reality but the slight bump didn't reveal you. You were however faced with a new challenge. The dust on the back of the speaker tower was shaken loose and raining down. You were so close, you couldn't let her win now. But that dust made your nose itch. You must not...

ATCHOO!

The whale woman immediately perked up at the sound of that tiny sneeze. She had less than a minute left to act. With big leaps she bounded over to the speaker tower and peered behind it. Nothing. She could've sworn that sneeze came from here. When she looked around a warm smile grew on her face. She saw her little man sprinting across the room. With just a few steps she was upon him.

"Found you!"

You looked up to see her looming over you, hovering a foot above you. She was getting straight into Godzilla mode. You were getting squashed one way or another. The best you have left to do is play along with her. "Noooooo...." You scream in vain before the huge foot slams down on you. In an instant you are flat on the floor and completely pinned. The supple skin on her sole rubs against you slightly. The weight feels odd to you. You know this should probably hurt in some way. The pressure is enormous and you can't move a muscle, but pain is completely absent from the picture. What is unmistakably present is the earthy smell of her feet. A tinge of sweat mixed in for good measure. The huge foot lifted off you, leaving you pretending to be busted in a heap. You put on a big smile so Johanna doesn't get concerned. But the whale had different ideas.

"Come on, on your feet. Run for me!"

You spring back up and start running. She seems sporting enough to actually let you take a few steps before crushing you underfoot again. Her monochrome foot introduces itself again in the same overwhelming fashion. This time she grinds it a little from side to side, rubbing some of that distinct smell onto you. You are permitted to get up again and use the opportunity to dash under her salon table. Above you the whale quickly boomed: "Hey! no fair!"

You only use it to cut a corner lest you risk her re-enacting the scene where Godzilla starts eating people. It bought you a few extra seconds before another heavy THOOM smothers you into the carpet. You ham up the panicky acting to great effect. Johanna loved cutting the frantic pleas short with a big stomp. Finally she began to grow a little tired of stomping you flat. Her smile was immense. You feel a lot better about your predicament knowing you brought her such happiness. Though you do silently hope your next game can put a smile on both your faces.

She picks you up and squeezes you like a human stress ball. You're not certain which Godzilla movie this is from, but your lungs are too crushed to offer any comments. Tired and content the whale slumps down on the couch. You're still held tightly when she moves you to her mouth. Your screaming face is pressed against her pursed lips. A big thankful kiss is plastered all over your face and her grip finally loosens a little. "That was fun. You almost had me with that hiding spot. Very clever." You're reminded of the prize you just missed out on. "Yeah, too bad it didn't last a few extra seconds." You say, longingly looking at those immense mounds. So close and yet so far away. Johanna responded with a mountainous shrug. "Oh what the hell, you've earned it. You played along perfectly."

Suddenly those glorious soft globes move towards you fast. She releases her iron grip on you and drops you on her rack. Your legs already slip into her cleavage whilst you stretch your arms to rub as much of the smooth surface as you can. The jiggling mass offers you no purchase and soon you sink in deeper. When you are buried up to your neck in her warm embrace she squeezes her tits together, stopping you from being completely submerged in her rack. She cranes her neck and reaches down to put another little kiss on your head.

Wedged into your own little slice of heaven you enjoy the immense comfort all around. But unfortunately good things don't last forever. Johanna offers you a few minutes of respite, but the day is only just beginning and she has plenty of games in mind.
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: Johanna wins, she gets to re-enact Godzilla wit...

choices: You two watch a movie, you stay pinned beneath her
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
Johanna eyes the little man wedged between her boobs with a mischievous glare. If he liked those big orbs, what other curves on her could he be made to appreciate? Her butt developed an itch she knew could only be scratched by you. Tiny as you were, the little bit of stomping around on you showed that you were more that hardy enough for her needs. She cooed softly, enjoying your subdued wiggling between her soft mounds. She wasn't opposed to letting you squirm there for longer, but the day had only just started. There would be plenty of opportunities left for the orca woman to stick you back there. She loosened her hold on her tits, letting you vanish into the depths of her cleavage. You don't panic as you can feel your feet already slip out at the bottom. You slide onto her belly and look up to her with sad puppy eyes.

"Easy there, little man. You'll get more chances to stay in there. But for now it's time you gave some attention to a different part of me."

You were hit with a wave of curiosity. You'd seen pretty much every part of her by now. Most of it far closer than you'd ever hoped. Heck, you've even been inside of her stomach. The only conclusion left for you to draw was that she was going to repeat some past interaction with you. You cross your heart and hope it's not her mouth again. You didn't like the idea of being soaked in drool or stomach juices so early in the day.

The large body below you turns, offering you a smooth-skinned slide onto the couch. You land on your feet and keep your balance. Johanna stands up, towering over you once more, and turns her back to you. Is she going to give any explanation as to what she's planning or...

Your thoughts are brought to a shuddering halt as she sits right back down again. But her big round bottom is coming straight for you! You try to run, but the large surface is upon you before you can take as much as a single step. It pushes you down onto your belly and smothers your entire form under untold amounts of whale blubber. Once the initial shock wears off you start to notice all the little details of your surroundings. The slightest tinge of sweat emanating from the pristine smooth surface pinning you down. The unsettling yielding nature of her buttcheek, slowly moulding itself more and more around your body. The clear sense of movement above you, her weight shifting back and forth. You can picture her rocking her body side to side to squash you just a little bit more. You were immobilized beneath her, not a muscle able to move.

Johanna giggled loudly, feeling the hopelessly stuck human plastered against her ass. She wiggled, twisted and turned, rolling her weight over him in as many creative ways as she could think of. Her soft butt rubbing against him was blissful, but she wanted more. It took some effort, but she shuffled over, revealing just your head sticking out from under her blubbery butt. It looked downright comical and your exasperated stare only added to the hilarity. Johanna chuckled at your misfortune and patted you on the head with one chubby finger.

"Well, at least one of us is having fun." You sigh.

"Don't be like that, I know you're enjoying it too. My butt doesn't lie and that warmth between your legs is hard to miss." Damn, she had you there. You only had one thing left to ask, blushing brightly.

"So... now what?"

"Well, if you're as much of an ass-man as you're showing me right now, I could turn around and wedge you inbetween them. Twice the buttcheeks, twice the fun, right?" Her logic was hard to counter. "Might be a bit on the smelly side, but you're used to my sweat by now." It gave you pause for thought, but she was kind of right. Her natural scent had been around you so much you barely even took notice of it anymore.

"Or, if being smothered flat beneath my butt is more your thing, we could go for that movie I suggested earlier. I'll turn you a little and you can just watch from down there whilst I keep you pinned. Since you're being such a good sport and not whining about this, I'll let you choose."
1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.title: Johanna sits on you

1212312111311112212121221111111111121122.content:
"I'll go for a nice movie, watching from down here beneath your soft buns."

Johanna giggled and adjusted herself, allowing you to get comfortable before she pinned you beneath her again. Her immense body lay along nearly the full length of the equally immense couch. All of it looking even more enormous from your shrunken perspective. You were laying on your belly, eyes on the big screen in front of you. The orca woman lazily grabbed the remote and began to look for a good movie to watch.

"Hmmm, you got any ideas for a movie?"

You mull over your options and a suggestion springs to mind. "How about a horror movie?"

Johanna giggles in response. "Ah yes, the horror movie. Such a fascinating human endeavour. A movie you watch not to unwind but to get stressed. Very unusual."

"Just pick one of the cheesy ones, they're not scary, just funny in how ridiculous they try to make themselves."

"You know, we watched you humans for many years before starting our invasion. Your horror movies were quite the talk around the observation ship. Feeling inspired by what they saw they even made a few themselves." Now you were just too curious.

"Hold up, you managed to create interstellar travel and you never came up with the concept of a scary movie?"

"Nope, though that didn't stop us when we learned about them."

"Okay, I've got to see this with my own eyes. What in the world would an alien horror movie look like?"

Johanna laughed again. "Okay, but don't say I didn't warn you." You were feeling particularly brave, even when smothered up to your shoulders beneath her soft buttcheek. She flipped the channel and popped into a menu screen. From there she picked a suitable movie. To your surprise on of the actors looked like the spitting image of the Queen. "Don't worry, if you behave yourself, I won't turn you in to the queen..." She then zips her suit back before she walks off, shaking her rear end. You don't think it could get much worse before you hear a rumble and gulp. The fox feels this and smirks, knowing what the pressure is. She then leans over a bit and let's out a fart that vibrated you and the back of the suit. She pants with her tongue out as her new butt cushion felt quite nice to fart on...

Inside of her butt, the only think you could breathe in is her farts, making you gag. You try to push out of her suit, but the gas was starting to make you submissive to the massive fox...

Later...

Or is she at the nearby glacier, which is rumored to have preserved many historical animals, like dinosaurs or mammoths and so forth?

You throw up the cover to the dumpster and start your dangerous trek towards the zoo. After all, it would make sense for her to try and utilize animals to do her biding considering certain species are much stronger or faster than humans and could easily be used to capture more human males or convert more human females. After a half an hour of a silent and hurried sprint throughout the city blocks you make it to the zoo.

The iron front gates have been smashed in, which means either Queen is here, or at least has been here… but that also means that all of those zoo animals are out and free to roam the city. Gulp! You’ll have to be extra careful on your way back to the dumpster tonight… if you make it back. You push those negative thoughts to the back of your mind as you slowly walk into the ransacked zoo. You look around, wondering where to go.

It's like someone filled up a balloon and you opened up the spout, letting the air rush into your face. After all of the fumes blast past you, you fall to your knees, heavily gasping, sucking up any fresh air you can. You then see two feet come into view.

The bear lady sighs and sniffs the noxious air a bit, “Woooh, can’t tell if that’s the bean burritos or the decade old milk I drank by accident?” Now another chunky fart escapes her booty and splatters all over your face, “Let me out.” The bear lady grins and slightly lifts her leg and one of her cheeks, “You’re pretty demanding for someone trapped under my butt. What’s in it for me if I let you out?” You grimace and continue to squirm, “I don’t know.
