You set off on your route to the park, you weave and dodge your way through various city blocks and buildings, trying to enter buildings or streets that Queen’s forces rarely ever go to or have little reason to enter. After a very stressful run you end up at the park.

You slow your running speed down to a quiet walk as you stop to take in the nice summer breeze, the warm sun and the general happy aura of the oddly quiet and empty park. You look around you and it seems that no one is nearby so you take a second to sit on a nearby bench and observe the nice park. The peaceful lake, the playground, the path for joggers and bikers. All was so peaceful, you even tilted your head back, closed your eyes and rested for a minute.

Remembering the good old days when you didn’t have to go outside and fear that your face was going to meet someone or something’s big, stinky butthole. Big mistake! You’re snapped out of your daydream when you hear a female voice approaching, “Hey there small fry. You look kind of lost, mind if I join you?” You don’t even care to look at who it is as you get up and sprint away from your female attacker as fast as possible. You need a place to hide, but where?
153.title: The park

1531.content: You run away as fast as you can as soon as you hear the lady's voice. You dart towards the playground, jumping over the side. At least that's what you imagine she thought. In truth, you leapt into the slide and now you're waiting for her to run past you. You hear her run past you, and you sigh in relief. You hear something come down the slide, to your horror. You turn towards the source, only to see a ladies rear slam into your face. She started to ride you like a sled down the slide until the end, flying off of it and landing on top of you. You're nose is pressed up against her groin, and you see her look down.
1531.title: You hide in one of the slides on the playground

1532.content: Before you can even try to run, a pair of breasts smack into your face as her body pins you down. The breasts that are in your face...
1532.title: Too late, you’re tackled by your female pursuer

choices: She had some personal fun with you
She carried you over to some other humans
She carrie dyou over to some animal people
You break out of her grip
15322.content:
You felt a thin strip of cloth between you and the breasts, and felt a bit of human skin on those breasts. You'd quickly conclude that these breasts belong to a human. The figure wrapped her arms around the back of your head, and leaned upwards, pulling you up with her, forcing you into a sitting position. Groggily, you craned your head upwards, in order to peak at your attacker.

Past the cleavage you're stuck in, you see the tanned skin of a fair woman, who's two heads taller than you. She had blonde hair, brown eyes, and a white tank-top along with purple skirt, underneath which were white underwear. She also had purple eyeshadow, purple lipstick, and some light blush. Were it not for the current happenings, you would've found her really pretty instead of terrifying right now.

"Hey now, what're you doing out here all on your own?" she wondered, still holding you tightly. Due to how she was holding you, it was a bit of a struggle to breath, let alone to speak. You couldn't tell her what's going on. She kept you held tight, and stood up, and you were suddenly reminded of how much taller she was than you. You felt your legs dangling, your feet only reaching her shins. She felt slightly wider than you, her shoulders spanning wider than yours. You figured she could lie down on you, and you'd disappear from the world.

"Aw, you look all lonely!" she cooed. "Maybe I can fetch you some company~?" That couldn't be good. Any attention was likely under Queen's control, and Queen was looking for you. You shuddered to think about what she'd do with you.
15322.title: ...belong to a shapely woman

choices: Ask her about the alien society.
Ask her if she knows where the queen is.
15323.content:
Your suddenly pressed against the ground, two preternaturally massive, firm breasts sandwiching your face. The first thing your dazed mind notices is that the breasts were covered in fur. You wriggle your head a bit, until you could look into the eyes of your captor.

She was a tall, anthropomorphic german shepherd!

“Haha! Caught ya!” she said, in a deep, low german accent. She looked a little skeevy, but didn’t seem entirely malevolent. To be honest, she just seemed a little drunk. “You’re one of them human boys, right? Hot damn! I was hoping I’d get a chance to see one of you before it was too late.”

She sits up, releasing the pressure off your face. You blush as her massive, naked form straddles smaller body, as she looks down on you, sizing you up. You couldn’t help but gasp as you get a good look at her. This was the first time you got to see an anthro up close and personal.

The first thing you notice was her lack of clothes. Like most anthros, she wore nothing more than a leather jacket and a collar, much to your dismay. This showed off her perfect, lean, muscular body for the world to see. Despite her athletic figure, she still had some curves; with impressive perky breasts and a wide waist resulting in a perfect hourglass figure. Her mangy fur made her look like the kind of person that worked out a lot, but didn’t actually care much about her physical appearance.

She carefully observed your form, seemingly genuinely curious. It occurs to you that this may be the first time she’s ever seen a male. She may be just as baffled as you are. “Aren’t you all supposed to be cooped up on the mothership?” she asks.

You didn’t want to tell her the truth, fearing she might get angry. So instead, you come up with a fake story on the spot. “Well, uh… I did get taken to the mothership a while ago,” you lie, “but the queen decided she didn’t want me, so she just… let me go.” You bite your lip, hoping the canine woman believes you. To your surprise, she bursts out laughing.

“Hahaha! You got rejected? By the queen? Shiiit! I didn’t even know that was possible…” she laughs at you right in your face, which is a little rude. Fortunately, she finally got off of you, so her powerful thighs weren’t straddling you anymore. “Oh, that’s gotta hurt.”

As she laughs at you, you timidly sit up, still gawking at the strange woman. “And now you got left all alone out here, in this big ol’ world? How sad...” she said when she calmed down. She pretended to sympathize with you, but it obviously wasn’t genuine. Before you could say anything, she reached out an arm and hugged you against her massive, furry side. “Well, don’t worry, kiddo. I can keep you company,” she teased ominously, and cackled when you tried to squirm out of her grip. “Aww, what’s the matter? Scared of the big bad wolf? Come on, relax. I don’t bite...”

Just as you were about to calm down, the obviously drunk canine woman inadvertently let out a prodigious belch, and you immediately coughed and sputtered as the stench hit your nostrils. “Ah! Excuse me! That one snuck up on me,” she said, and then laughed as you squirmed. “Oh, come on. It wasn’t that bad.”

The smell that clung to the inside of your nostrils was your second sign that were about to have a bad day.

---


Soon, she had you sit next to her on one of the park benches, the woman lighting a cigarette as the bench creaks under her tall form. The dog woman starts asking you various questions about your life, and still stuck in her tight grip, you have no choice but to answer them. “What’s your name, anyway?” she asked, before reconsidering. “Wait. Do males even have names?”

You were about to correct her, but you realize you don’t want her to know your name, so she’ll have more trouble tracking you down later. “Uh… no,” you lie.

"Oh! Haha! They probably just call you ‘male #390’ or something, huh?” she laughed, slapping you on the back. “Back when I was a regular dog, they named me Sadie. But you can call me Franziska.”

“Um… okay,” you shrug, not truly understanding. “You used to be… just a dog?”

“In a sense. But when the mothership arrived, the queen blessed every female of every species in the world with more… dexterous forms,” she said, tracing a hand over her muscular belly and firm breasts, proud of her new body. “Y’know, if the queen doesn’t want you, you should hang out with me instead. I’ve always been told that males are weak, so I kind of want to… ‘test your limits’,” she smiled, ominously.

You shudder. “Uh… no thanks.”

“Oh, I insist,” she said, a bit more assertively, gripping you tighter. “I simply can’t let a tasty looking little thing like you wander the streets on your own. You’d get eaten alive! … literally!” She cackled. “Stick with me, though, and I’ll take good care of you.”

“So… you’re not gonna hurt me?” you ask, timidly.

“No promises,” she teased. “After all, you do look like you’d make a good seat cushion… or a snack.” She laughed uproariously, as if she had just told some hilarious joke. You stare at her, not knowing if she was serious or not.

The two of you sit there for a while as she finishes smoking her cigarette in silence. You squirm a little, uncomfortable about being so close to the half-naked canine, especially since she looked like she could be a supermodel. She didn’t seem to notice your discomfort, though, and eventually, you were able to calm down and relax your head against her soft fur.

You had heard stories of the terrible things anthros did to the men they capture, but so far, ‘Franziska’ doesn’t seem that bad. A little gross and rude, sure, but she didn’t seem like she wanted to kill you or anything. She seemed like she was just having fun… even though it may be at your expense.

You’d normally take the opportunity to run away, but… you hadn’t talked to anybody in a long, long time. You’ve spent so long running and hiding from everybody you’ve seen. Maybe, if you avoid making her mad, this canine woman could turn out to be a valuable ally?
15323.title: Athletic German Shepherd Woman

choices: She wants to play around with you a bit.
153232.content:
As she smokes, she calms down a little bit, and her grip on you relaxes. Eventually, she releases you from her grip completely. You had the opportunity to run away from her, but… you didn’t want to be alone anymore. ‘Franziska’ didn’t seem to be too bad, and maybe you could even get her to help you on your quest. “So… do you, uh, happen to know where the Queen is, now?” you ask her, timidly. “I want to, um… convince her to give me a second chance,” you lie, trying not to sound suspicious.

“You’re seriously desperate to pledge yourself to that bitch?” The German Shepherd cackled, raising a brow. “Wow. They really did brainwash you.”

You cringe at her words, but you see an opportunity to dig for information. “Um… what’s wrong with the queen?”

“She’s an absolute, unbearable narcissist! Conquered half the useful planets in the galaxy just to sate her own ego,” she said, gesturing dramatically, waving her cigarette around. “To make matters worse, she’s hogging all the men in the galaxy all to herself! Now that’s just selfish...”

Talking about the queen really got her going. You could tell they had some bad blood. “You really hate the queen, huh?” you say, pondering the situation. “Well… let’s say, hypothetically, I was on a mission to, uh… overthrow the queen…?”

Franziska turns and stares at you with a weird look in her eyes, and your voice trails off. “No way…” she says incredulously, as if she couldn't tell if you were serious. “How the hell is a little shrimp like you planning to overthrow the queen?”

You think about it for a second. You’ve been searching for the queen for a while, but you haven’t really thought this whole plan through well, in retrospect. “Well, I figured I’d just need to recruit some powerful allies,” you eventually decide. “Like… you, maybe?”

You jump a bit as the dog woman bursts out laughing, her busty chest heaving. “Hahaha! Oh, and I thought you were going to be boring,” she chuckles. “I like your spunk, kid, but if anybody’s going to be leading a mission like that, it’ll be me.” You didn’t fully understand what she meant by that, but you took it as a ‘no’. With that, she tossed her cigarette over her shoulder, and stood up from the bench, as you suddenly found yourself at crotch-level. Before you could react, she grabbed your hand.

“Now, come on. I think it’s about time you got… settled in.”

---

Franziska continued to hold your much smaller hand tightly as she led you deeper downtown. You grew increasingly nervous as you walked. Since the invasion, you had always gotten around by hiding in alleyways and abandoned buildings. You weren’t used to just walking down the street in plain sight like this. As the two of you walked, you passed a few strange women, who all stopped and stared. If you were alone, those women definitely would’ve grabbed you… but with Franziska by your side, they tended to just let you pass by. “Oooh! What do we have here?” one strange anthropomorphic bird lady cooed, as you passed her in the street. She made a point of waving her humongous feathery breasts right in your face as she said it, teasing you.

“This one’s mine. Get your own,” Franziska growled, yanking you away from the other woman and leading you away. The bird woman seemed a little angered by this, but just decided to stomp off with a hmph! Was Franziska… defending you? Did she think she owned you now? You didn’t know exactly what her intentions were, but you huddled closely by her furry side, her protection making you feel a little more comfortable. You shuddered as she continued leading you through the streets, seeing that the whole city seemed like a ghost town now. Soon, she dragged you off into some apartment in a quiet area of town. It was actually quite a huge, luxury apartment, with a beautiful view over the city below. You’ve been sleeping on the streets for the last couple of weeks, so it looked incredibly appealing.

“Is this…?” you gasp, having trouble articulating your words. “Can I…?”

“You can chill here any time you want, little guy,” Franziska said, as she let you inside. “But while you’re under my roof, consider me your master. What I say, goes.” She smirks as you wander the apartment, looking exhilarated. As you walk around, she collapses on her long couch. “And first thing’s first, pipsqueak. After a walk like that, my feet are killing me,” she demands. “Fix that for me, will you?”

She has you kneel in front of a big footstool, which she plops her huge, greasy feet onto. Seriously, her paws were massive -- each one almost the size of your face! And they smelled surprisingly terrible, too -- you don’t get the impression that this woman bathes much. As she relaxed on her couch, her gesturing made it obvious that she expected you to massage her gigantic paws. “Seriously?” you ask, baffled by the situation.

“Hey, I’m starting you off easy,” Franziska shrugged. “Just be thankful I’m not making you lick them clean.” You were about to argue, but decide it was probably best not to test her patience. The fate of the men who were brought onto the mothership was much worse, or so you’ve heard -- this probably wasn’t that bad. Plus, she was letting you live with her.You curiously bring up your hands, and start to reluctantly knead and massage her paw pads and furry skin with your thumbs. You gagged a bit as your fingers were covered in her sticky sweat, and the powerful stench of her gigantic paws hit your nostrils. You didn’t know it was possible for them to smell this bad. “Heh. Is this seriously too gross for you?” Franziska snickered. “You better get a stronger stomach, or you’re not long for this world, kiddo.”

You put your disgust aside and redouble your efforts, eager not to disappoint your only ally. You never quite get used to the stench, but you quickly learn to bear it. As you continue massaging her greasy pawpads, you think about the day’s events. Could you really trust Franziska? She was a bit mean, and might only want you as a slave. Then again, she did defend you from that bird woman. Did she actually care about you, on some level?

As she relaxed on the couch, watching television, you couldn’t help but notice you had an uninhibited view of her half-naked, athletic body. You tried your hardest not to stare, though she probably wouldn’t mind it even if you did.

You tried to watch the television with her to kill time while you massaged her paws. The normal channel had apparently been replaced with some weird game show, that seemed to consist mostly of those weird green cat aliens humiliating helpless males. “Pathetic! You can’t even lift a measly 400 pounds!” a cat woman taunted one of the males, who had just lost a ridiculously impossible weight lifting challenge. “You probably couldn’t even lift lil ol' me, could you?” Before the exhausted man could respond, the cat sat on him, his head disappearing between her massive green cheeks as she straddled his face. The audience laughed uproariously as the man struggled futilely under her smothering flesh, and she lets out a loud fart directly onto his face for good measure. “I guess that’s our answer, folks!” the cat laughed. You shivered at the cruel torture, turning your head away from the screen. Franziska, on the other hand, just seemed disturbingly amused.

After a while, Franziska grew tired of just lounging around.
153232.title: A New Home

1532321.content:
“Now, come to think of it, you probably haven’t gotten much to eat lately, have you?” Franziska realized. As if on cue, your stomach grumbled loudly, betraying your piercing hunger. Over the past week, your only food has been the few snacks you were able to steal from abandoned supermarkets. They were enough to tide you over at first, but you’ve been feeling weaker every day. You nod hungrily, and she smirks, leans forward, and ruffles your hair with her huge hand. “Well, it’s getting late. Why don’t I whip something up, then?”

“Um… okay,” you reply, reluctantly. You didn’t know if you trusted her to cook for you, but your hunger overpowered your paranoia. The canine woman walked off into another room -- presumably her kitchen -- as you sat there, continuing to watch the television. You hear the sounds of something boiling in the kitchen, and a strange scent wafts through the apartment.

After around a half an hour, she called you into the dining room. You took a seat, and Franziska dropped a huge plate onto the table in front of you. On it was some kind of weird alien beef, topping a salad of similarly alien chopped fruits. The meal glowed fluorescent green, much to your dismay, and smelled like cheap jewelry. You gave her a dubious look, but she egged you on eagerly. “Try it, it’s an alien recipe. You’ve never had anything like it,” Franziska urges you. Reluctantly, you take a bite of the green mystery meat. Satisfied with the taste, you dug in hungrily.

Soon, you finish your dinner, and lean back in your chair, your hunger finally fully satisfied. But instead of feeling content, you’re actually starting to feel a little queasy. Before you knew it, your head was starting to spin, and you were feeling incredibly lethargic. The room around you became a blur as you slopped to your knees. There must’ve been something wrong with that meat she fed you!

“Something’s… wrong…” you managed to groan, before you collapse gently onto the carpet. Soon, you’ve patched out of consciousness completely.

---

It was almost an hour later that you finally opened your eyes again. Your head was still spinning, and you could hardly see anything through the blur, but you somehow managed to stand up. Once you got your bearings, you could immediately tell that something was wrong. Everything seemed… huge. Once you took a few minutes to look around and take in your surroundings, you realize the terrible truth.

You had shrunk!

Before you could contemplate your situation, Franziska appeared before you. She was now huge compared to you, towering over you like a giantess. She seemed amused by your new height. “Haha! You actually fell for that?” she laughed, kneeling over so she was about eye-level with you.

“For… what?” you ask. Franziska had already been very tall compared to you -- now, she seemed colossal.

“You ate size meat! Oldest prank in the book,” she said, and you gasped a little as she picked you up in her furry palm and held you up to eye-level. “Welp, guess you’re my little toy for this evening. Better get comfortable -- it’s going to be a long night!” she teased, as she started walking, with you cupped in her hands.

“Please… put me down…” you say as she walks into her bedroom.

She smirked widely as you said that. “If you say so!” She shrugs, and suddenly drops you!

You scream in abject terror as you fall through the air, even though your descent only lasted a few seconds before you land safely on her bed, your fall broken by her pillow. You lay on the pillow, gasping, adrenaline still pumping through the veins. Just as you got to your bearings, Franziska leaped onto the bed, knocking you off balance again. You turn around, and see her laying belly-down on the bed, her massive head resting comfortably on the pillow in front of you. You cringe as her immense eyes stare at you with a mix of excitement and curiosity.

“I’ve been shrunken a few times myself before, but I’ve never actually managed to shrink anyone else,” she said. Franziska obviously thought that this was no big deal. You, on the other hand, felt like you were losing your mind. Before you could pry out in protest, Franziska picked you up by your shirt collar, and rolled over onto her back. You looked down, to see her lazily yawn open her mouth, dangling your tiny body over her massive maw. “I’ve always wondered what another person would taste like…”

“Wait! No!” Your heart sinks, and you desperately try to cling onto her fingers, to no avail. She easily shakes you off, and you fall into her wet, dark canine mouth. You blindly reach out as you fall, and managed to grip onto her tongue. You were immediately covered in sticky saliva from head to toe, and your nostrils were assaulted with the meaty scent of her breath. As you hang onto her tongue, you look down, and see the long, dark tunnel of her throat stretching open beneath your feet.

Franziska closes her eyes, and relaxes on her bed as she flicks you around her mouth with her tongue. She doesn’t seem to be trying to hurt you, but really enjoys your taste… maybe too much. You try to climb up her tongue, only to slid back down, deeper and deeper towards her beckoning throat. Your world becomes a confusing blur of colors and feelings as you’re dragged around the massive canine’s maw, but you ignore the confusion by focusing on not getting swallowed.

Eventually, she realizes that she might’ve went too far, and spits you out onto her hand. You were now caked in her saliva, with all your clothes having been torn to pieces and your hair messy and wet. Even so, you were just relieved to be out of her mouth.

“Wow, uh! You are… actually the most delicious thing I’ve ever tasted,” Franziska said, actually looking a bit surprised as she looks down on your tiny, naked form. “I’ve got to do that more often!”

You weakly crawled onto your knees, coughing. You have a brief moment of respite before she drops you on the bed again.

“Now, don’t think you’re getting off that easy!” Franziska smiled, sounding sadistically excited as she stands up. “Remember when I said you had to get used to, eh, gross experiences to survive out here? I figured, why don’t I help you out with a little… immersion therapy?”

Just the tone of her voice makes you shudder. What could she have planned? You turn around, to see her massive, furry ass hovering over you. Before you can even scream, she sits down upon you.

Her massive furry rear immediately presses you tightly against the bed, and you were enveloped in darkness. Though her furry cheeks were larger than your entire body, they were soft and cushiony, and thus didn’t seriously injure you.

This was probably helped by the fact that neither of them fell directly on top of you -- instead, your tiny, doll-like body was pressed against her sweaty crack. This gave you a bit of breathing room, but was utterly disgusting, especially when she’s at this size.

You tried not to stay calm, and didn’t move a muscle. Not satisfied with this, she lifted one leg and let out a massive, terrifying loud fart directly on your tiny form. From your perspective, it was like being hit by a powerful, nauseous burst of air. Disgusted, you immediately start squirming with all your remaining strength, only serving to wedge yourself further.

“Hey! I’m just doing you a favor!” Franziska teased, as she rubbed her butt against the bed, driving you further and further into her sweaty, noxious crack.

After a few minutes, your tormentor finally stood up. However, you were wedged so deeply in her crack that even this didn’t allow you to slip free. Her cheek’s warm flesh and fur pressed tightly against you on both sides, preventing you from moving a muscle.

Your space grew even more compact as she started walking through the house, and her huge hips bent and shifted to and for. Feeling your entire body trapped and masticated between her plush cheeks was apparently immensely amusing to Franziska, and you heard her giggle uncontrollably as she teased you.

She settled in the kitchen and finished her dinner, enjoying the idea of going about her daily business while feeling you wedged where the sun don’t shine. It made her feel incredibly powerful, to so easily dominate another person with her firm ass. She had to try shrinking people more often.

While you wait, completely immobile, you lose track of time. The minutes drag by like hours, and you could only hope you were going to be released from this nightmare soon. Worse still, she lets out a few silent but noxious farts every once in awhile as she eats, being released directly onto your helpless, tiny body.

Eventually, after filling her belly with steak, she decided to have mercy on you. She stands up, and grabs you from your fleshy prison. You cough and sputter as you’re held in her hands, still covered in sweat and stinking of flatulence. “Whoo! You reek!” she laughed, fanning the air in front of her nose. She still seemed pretty casual, as if she expected you to be laughing along with her.
1532321.title: Shrunken Toy

choices: When you wake up, you're back to normal.
When you wake up, you're still tiny!
15323212.content:
To her surprise, you only let out a single, long sob. You had been trying to keep your emotions bottled up, but after everything that’s happened to you, you couldn’t take it anymore. You started crying loudly in her hand, and her eyes widened at the sudden outburst. “Are you... crying?” she said, as if she genuinely didn’t expect this kind of response. Her smile immediately shifts into a frown as she watches you cry, and she tries to lift a hand to comfort you.

“No!” you scream, waving your arm angrily at her, wiping tears from your face. “Go away!”

Judging from the expression on her face, she was actually feeling very guilty. Her and her friends did crazy, gross things like this to each other all the time, but usually, it was all just fun and games, and ended with both parties laughing it off. Franziska hadn’t expected this kind of reaction. “Hey, come on. Don’t be like that. I’m just playin’ around…” she said, showing genuine remorse as she gently set you down on the couch.

“This isn’t a game! This is torture!” you cried angrily at her, not entirely coherent. “I trusted you, and you shrunk me!”

Her canine ears drooped as she realized she had gone too far. “Aww... jeez, kid. I’m really sorry,” she apologized, still sounding a little surprised. “I didn’t know you hated it that much. Us aliens play jokes like this on each other all the time...”

“Yeah, well… I’m not an alien…” you said angrily, crossing your arms.

“... yeah, I see what you mean. I guess humans see these things differently,” she said, pondering the situation. She had never actually talked to a human before. She hadn’t actually known that this kind of thing was considered cruel from a human’s perspective. “Look. I honestly wasn’t trying to hurt you, kiddo. I promise I’ll never trick you like this again.”

You sniffle, finally calming down. “... could you, uh, unshrink me, maybe?” you said, loud enough for her to hear.

“Oh, I’m sorry. The shrink meat’s effects are probably going to last until sunrise,” she frowned, sitting down on the couch next to you. “But I can take good care of you for the rest of tonight. Okay? Promise I won’t do anything gross again.” You considered it. You could tell her apology was genuine, though you didn’t know if you were ready to trust her again yet. But at this size, you couldn’t really do much on your own. You were going to need her to help you out a bit.

“Okay… I forgive you…” you finally nod. “As long as you swear not to lie to me again.” At this, Franziska smiled; her most warm, loving smile you’ve seen since you met her. You could tell that she really did care for you on some level, despite her odd behavior.

She picks you up gently in her palms again, whispering further apologies in your ears as she started walking. You would never admit it, but it was actually quite relaxing to be carried around in her hands -- it was almost like lying in a furry hammock. “Now let’s get you washed off and call it a day, huh?” she offered, to which you lazily nodded. “You’ll be all back to normal by the time you wake up tomorrow morning.”

She walks off and cleans your doll-sized body in the sink, lathering you with an exotic soap. The soap was apparently extremely effective, and after your ‘bath’, you no longer smelled like sweat, saliva and flatulence. You enjoyed the feeling of relative cleanliness while Franziska got ready to sleep, and settled down in her bed. She spends a few minutes telling you a story of her adventures in outer space, before kissing your forehead sweetly. “Goodnight,” she whispered, and settled down to slumber.

She fell asleep quickly, leaving you time to ponder things. While the giant canine slept, she cuddled your tiny body like you were a teddy bear, nuzzling you in her cleavage and against her warm chest. While this was awkward at first, you eventually came to realize your ‘bed’ was incredibly comfortable. There was nothing quite like cuddling with someone ten times your height, especially one covered with fur.

As you fall asleep, you realize being shrunk wasn’t all that bad. You could probably get used to it, if need be.
15323212.title: Heartfelt Apology

153232121.content:
You’ve been sleeping in alleyways and abandoned buildings for over a week now. Though you didn’t expect it, slumbering while cuddled up with the humongous canine woman resulted in the best sleep you’ve had in days. You wake up late the next morning, alone in the bed, finally feeling comfortable and well-rested. Better yet, you discover that Franziska had kept her promise, and you were now back to normal. Still a little sore, of course, but at least you were your usual height.

You roll over, and realize that it was almost noon! You’ve been sleeping for over 16 hours! You didn’t know you were that exhausted. Your old clothes had been torn to ribbons, but you were lucky enough to find a new outfit in the closet -- probably from whoever used to live in this apartment before the invasion. You rubbed the sleep from your eyes as you emerged into the living room, and Franziska looks over her shoulder at you from the kitchen. “Well, well, well! Look who finally crawled out of bed!” she greets you.

“Good morning, Franziska,” you say, before you’re hit by the smell of something delicious cooking. “What’s cooking?”

“Breakfast,” she answers simply, directing you to the dining room table. “And please, call me Fran.” You took a seat, and Franziska loudly dropped a plate onto the table before you, upon which were a few slices of tomato toast topped with macadamia ricotta. It looked pretty normal, but you flashed Franziska a questioning look anyway. “This one’s just regular human food, I promise!” she laughs, and you dig in eagerly to your meal.

Franziska sat across from you, chomping down on a big, juicy steak. The two of you actually had a lovely breakfast, and she seemed equal parts amused and fascinated as you told her all about the way Earth used to be before the invasion. It was really nice to be able to just sit down and talk with someone again. She seemed to really open up during the conversation, and showed a bit of her soft side. The sordid events of yesterday were already seeming like a distant memory.

“Y’know, now that I think about it, being tiny wasn’t that bad,” you say, absent-mindedly, only for Fran to get the biggest smirk on her face you’ve ever seen.

“Haha! I knew it wasn’t as bad as you were saying it was!” she laughed, excited that you were coming around to her way of looking at things. “Well, it was fun on my end, too. In fact, I think I ‘ought to get me one of those size rays the cats have.” You go pale at the thought of Fran being able to shrink you down at will.

“Uh! I didn’t say I want to be tiny ALL the time...” you leap up and insist, your reaction only exacerbating the canine’s laughter.

“Oh, don’t you worry your adorable little self. I’m a woman of my word. I wouldn’t use it against you, squirt, unless you wanted me too,” she said, before pausing and leaning forward, conspiratorially, and whispering, “but, if we’re really going to take on the queen… we’ve got to have weapons.” Your heart leaps in your chest as she says those words.

“R-really…?” you gasp, hoping you were hearing her right. “Y-you’re going to help me…?” You don’t even have to finish your sentence. The look on her face says it all.

“Yeah, I’ll help you knock the queen down a peg. It’s the least I could do to make it up to you after last night. Besides, if anybody’s going to be in charge, it should be you and me, right?” she smiled, a big, sly smile. You could almost jump for joy. You not only had a friend, but your first real ally as well! With Fran’s help, you were one step closer to taking down the queen. Before you could celebrate, though, Franziska lifts a finger. “Now, hold on before you get too excited. We can’t take on the queen by ourselves. If you really want her gone, you’ll need some sort of revolution.”

That took the wind out of your sails. A whole revolution? You didn’t know that much about alien society. How could you start a revolution? You wouldn’t even know where to start. “What do you mean?” you ask, hoping for some more info.

“Well, the way I see it, you have two options,” she says, the levity in the room quickly dissipating. This was the fate of the world you were discussing here, after all -- very serious business. If you were going to come up with a plan, it had to be a good one. “The only reason the Queen took over is because she brainwashed all the humans first. If we can find out how she’s doing that, and release the humans from her control, they’ll take back control of the Earth lickety-split.” She pauses for a moment while you consider it. It would be nice to have everyone back to normal again. “On the other hand, it might be easier to just inspire her subjects to revolt. You know, those green cat ladies? They do all the queen’s dirty work. If we can turn them against her, she won’t stand a chance.”

You take a long time to consider the situation. Franziska needed you because you had valuable insight on human society. You need Franziska because she had valuable insight on alien society. If you wanted to convince the aliens to revolt, you’d have to let Fran take charge, while rescuing the brainwashed humans would probably be more your expertise. “Either way, we’ve got to find a way into the mothership, right?” you note.

“Exactly what I was thinking,” she smiled, and you felt a little proud. “Now, listen. A friend of mine helps maintain the mothership. She can definitely get us inside.” You beam at the prospect of having another ally, especially one with intimate knowledge of how the mothership functions. Despite the seriousness of the conversation, Franziska couldn’t help but laugh when she saw your face light up. “Ugh! You’re too adorable,” she groans, as she tries to compose herself. “Ahem! Anyway. The only problem is, she only ever actually leaves the mothership to go to meetings and parties. So we’ll have to catch her the next time she’s out.”

“When will that be?” you ask.

“Tomorrow,” she answered, gravely. “So we better get a move on.”
153232121.title: Your First Ally

1532321211.content:
“This city looks like a ghost town nowadays.”

After relaxing at the apartment for a few more hours, you and Fran were back on the streets, on your way to what Fran calls one of the ‘alien guard posts’. The roads and alleys were completely silent and empty, much to your dismay. “It pretty much is,” Fran nods curtly as she walks, you clutching tightly to her side. “After the invasion, pretty much everybody was dragged off to that damn mothership.” This strikes you as odd. The queen’s space ship was huge, probably around the size of a shopping mall, but it didn’t look big enough to contain the whole city’s population.

“Everybody?” you ask. “On one ship?”

“It’s bigger than it looks,” Fran explains simply. With that, your curiosity towards the alien’s technology only grew. You had to see the inside of that mothership one day, your resolved. Right now, you could only wonder what its interior could look like. Fran snaps her clawed fingers, interrupting your daydreams. “Let’s get serious, now. The aliens keep one of their size rays on the wall at this guard post we’re heading too. But if we’re going to run away with it, we’re going to need a distraction,” Fran says, and stares at you expectantly, as if expecting you to pick up on what she was saying.

“... what kind of distraction?” you ask, on cue.

“To lure the alien away from her post, we’ll need bait. And we’ve got the best bait available right here,” Fran frowns, pointing at you. You were a bit taken aback at this suggestion.

“... me?” you ask, as if unsure whether or not she’s being serious. “Are you crazy?’

She sighs. “Listen. I knew all along that story you told me earlier was a complete lie. The queen didn’t reject you. The queen doesn’t even know you exist,” Fran says, and you cringe when you remember the fake story you told her at the park the previous day. “After all, the queen pays extreme bounties for males who are able to resist her hypnosis.” You pause in your tracks, considering her words.

“So, you’re saying I’m… valuable?” you speculate. You didn’t know whether to be flattered or terrified.

“About one of the most valuable things left on this miserable planet. You’re the perfect bait,” Fran shrugs. “Don’t worry. We’ll find some way to make sure she doesn’t actually catch you.” Eventually, after about a half hour’s worth of walking, you finally reach the street where the guard post is supposed to be. Fran has you duck down an alleyway nearby, and you watch curiously as she rearranges some cardboard boxes into a sort of makeshift stairway reaching up to a tall, concrete wall. Satisfied with her work, she turned to you.

“Alright, I’ll go get her. While she’s occupied with you, I’ll grab the size ray. Remember, the second she sees you, bolt down this alleyway,” Fran kneels in front of you, and gestures as she explains her plan. “Climb up those boxes and over the wall, and you’ll be on the homestretch. She won’t be able to follow you -- she’s too heavy to do any climbing.” It sounded like a good plan for such short notice, but you weren’t entirely sure.

“What if she calls for back-up?” you ask.

“I’ll come shrink her before she can pull anything like that,” Fran says, as if this whole heist was no big deal. You, on the other hand, were still visibly nervous, and you could hardly stop your hands from shaking as you thought about what you had to do. Seeing this, Franziska sighed. “Hey, come on. Don’t be so nervous. I’ve pulled off plans like this plenty of times before. You can trust me, right?” Fran tries to calm you down, which proves to be a little effective, at least.

You stand near the entrance of the alleyway, in plain sight, and hold your breath as you watch Fran rush around the corner towards the guard post. For a few moments, everything is terrifyingly silent… until you hear a loud, feminine voice boom from around the corner. “What!? A rogue male!?” the guard yelled in surprise, and you heard crashing noises as she rushed from her post. Within moments, she emerged -- and you were now face-to-face with a huge, alien cat woman, who was almost twice your height.

The second she saw you, she got a look in her eyes that made you shudder. With a single flick of her wrist, she revealed a massive extendable baton, and before you could react, she rushed towards you at incredible speed. You only barely manage to dodge her charge, ducking into the alleyway at the last possible moment. She swung her baton at you as she ran, missing your head by inches. “Stop! You’re under arrest, by the queen’s demand!” the cat lady demanded, with a sadistic smirk on her face.

You didn’t bother to respond. You just ran down straight down the alleyway as fast as you could, hearing the footsteps of her paws colliding with the wet pavement as she chased you down. The alien was so close, you swore you could feel her breath on the back of your neck.

Once you reached the end of the alleyway, you without hesitation scaled the boxes in three quick steps, and leaped over the wall with all your remaining strength.
1532321211.title: Live Bait

choices: Test the limits of the size gun.
15323212111.content:
You jump higher than you ever thought possible, jumping from the highest box and easily clearing the wall. You landed on the rooftop of one of the shorter stores, overlooking the alleyway below. The alien cat stopped in her tracks before the wall, staring up at you malevolently. Frustrated, she folded her arms. “Hey! No fair! Get back down and fight me like a man, fugitive!” she pouted, beckoning to you like a dog. In response, you only stuck your tongue out at her, angering her further.

Finally, Franziska emerged behind her, with a smirk on her face. “You! Help me bring down this rogue male!” she loudly demanded, only for Fran to remain completely silent. “Hey! Are you fucking deaf? I said help me-” Before she could finish her sentence, Franziska pointed the size ray directly in the cat’s face, and the alien froze and stared down the barrel of the gun like a deer in headlights. Before she could react, Franziska pulled the trigger, and you were blinded as a brilliant flash of light filled the alleyway.

By the time your vision cleared, the cat lady had completely disappeared! You thought, for a moment, that she had been disintegrated, until you looked closer and noticed her tiny body on the ground. She had been shrunk! The once-massive alien was now around the size of a doll. Franziska had the biggest smirk on her face as she loomed over her freshly shrunken prey. You hopped down from your perch on the roof, while Fran picked up the tiny cat woman in her hands.

“Got ya!” Fran laughed, surprisingly gleeful. She seemed to love having power over others. “How’s that for a ‘stupid little mutt’?” She apparently had some existing contempt for this particular cat.

“Do you know her?” you ask, examining the tiny cat woman.

“Haha! I’d say so. She’s been a pain in my side since she came here,” Fran said, looking at the cat with hate in her eyes. “Strolling around the city acting like she owns the place -- abusing her power. She’d always shrink everyone who even criticized her, and swallow them whole.” She brought the tiny cat up to eye-level, reveling in her torture. “Isn’t that right, short stuff?” she taunted.

“Let me go, you bitch!” the cat woman screams at the top of her lungs, loud enough for you to hear, as she squirms futily in Franziska’s grip. Her protests fall on deaf ears as Franziska teases her, playing with her tiny body like a toy. You couldn’t help but chuckle a little bit at the display. “When I get back to normal size, I’ll kill you for this!”

“Rude… but I never expected anything more from you,” Franziska shook her head, a little surprised that the cat maintained her pride even after being shrunk to a measly 4 inches. “In fact, I’d say it’s time for you to have a taste of your own medicine.” Smug in her victory, Franziska leaned her head back, and dangled the cat over her wide-open mouth. The cat screamed as she stared down at the waiting maw, but received no mercy.

“No! Don’t you dare! Do you know who I am-” the shrunken alien yells, but before she can finish her sentence, Fran drops her onto her tongue. You watch, stunned and silent, as Franziska savors the taste of the tiny cat woman squirming in her jaws. Seeing your interest, Fran leans close to you and opens her mouth, letting you watch closely as she bats the doll-sized cat lady around with her tongue. The cat tried to protest, but was unable to even choke out a word as the canine’s tongue toyed with her naked body.

This continues for a while, you watching with morbid fascination the entire while, before Fran decides it’s time to wrap things up. You witnessed her tongue press the cat against the back of her throat, before Fran closed her mouth and swallowed with one loud gulp! You watched with awe as a large, wriggling bulge slid slowly but smoothly down Franziska’s furry neck, before disappearing behind her breasts. When she opened her mouth again, the cat was nowhere to be seen.

You were frozen with awe at this… until Fran took the opportunity to unleash a huge belch right into your face. You recoiled, coughing and sputtering at the noxious smell, and Fran stood back and laughed at your reaction as the cat settled in her stomach. “Haha! Sorry! Should’ve stayed outside the ‘blast zone’,” Franziska giggled, as she rubbed her belly with a hand. “Ah, well. Out with the old, in with the new.” When you finally get your bearings, you gasp as you think about the full implications of what just happened.

“Did you really just SWALLOW her?” you ask, and Fran stared at you like that was a dumb question.

“Well, obviously. Trust me, she’s an evil, hateful little thing. Had this coming for a looong time,” Franziska waved a hand dismissively. “And don’t pretend to be disgusted! I saw that look on your face. You were fascinated.” You immediately averted her gaze, staring at the ground. She was right. Getting a close up view of her swallowing that cat lady was… strangely invigorating. You looked down at Franziska’s muscular belly, and realize that the alien was so small, she didn’t even leave a bulge.

“Well, at least you managed to grab the size ray,” you sigh, trying to change the subject. You expected the size ray to look like a stereotypical alien ray gun, but it actually resembled a fairly bulky high-tech rifle, adorned with sleek black angles and strange neon lights. Franziska held it up proudly, getting a good look at it.

“Yep! I’ve been wanting to get my hands on one of these babies for a while now,” Franziska smiled. “We should have no trouble defending ourselves now.”

So that’s one thing taken care of. While Franziska merely enjoys the feeling of movement in her belly, you sit back and think about the day ahead. You still had to attend that party tomorrow, and who knows what could happen there… what should you do to prepare?
15323212111.title: Vengeance, and Other Delicious Snacks

choices: Fran decides to stay a giantess for a while longer.
153232121111.content:
“So, that size gun…” you ask, trying to turn your mind from what you just witnessed. “Can it change anybody to any size?”

“Almost,” Franziska shook her head, as she examined the weapon more closely. She brought it to your face, pointing to the ‘SET TARGET SIZE’ meter on the side. “It can make people as small as a doll or as big as a house. Any more than that, is just too dangerous.”

As she fiddles with the meter a little bit, she gets a strange smirk on her face. “Hmm… hey. Remember how I promised not to shrink you again?”

“Yeah…” you shrug, not liking where this conversation was headed.

“I never said I couldn’t grow myself!” she smiled, pressing the ray against her chest. Before you could react, you were once again blinded by an immense, shining light.

When you came back to your senses, you were treated to the all-too-familiar sight of Franziska towering over you. She was now a decent 20 feet tall! “If you wanted to know how tall I could get, this is about the limit,” she says, spinning around, rubbing her hands all over her gigantic, naked body. “How do I look?”

You were speechless. What happened last night was one thing -- she didn’t get bigger, she just seemed bigger -- but now, she was actually huge! She was more than four times your height! It was so surreal to see her stand almost as tall as the buildings beside her. You took a deep breath, trying to calm yourself.

You could handle this. She may be some kind of giantess, but you didn’t have to be afraid -- she did promise not to hurt you, after all. “You look… incredible,” you say.

“Aww, please. You’re too kind,” she laughed, so large she could just barely comfortably fit in the alleyway. “I can’t stay this large all the time, of course. We’re trying not to attract attention. But I can carry you home,” she offered, and you paused. You wouldn’t like to relive the events of yesterday, but… you kind of liked being so small compared to the woman. It was a novelty, at least, and oddly exciting.

“Um… okay,” you nod, reluctantly, and the giant canine woman suddenly lifts you up by the shirt collar. You’re nauseated by your rapidly shifting perspective as she lifts you in the air. Since she didn’t have any clothing or pockets, she just set you down onto her shoulder, and you clung to her long, soft fur for dear life.

“Whoa!” you shout, overcome by a feeling of vertigo as you look at the ground below your perch.

“Ready?” Franziska giggled. “Hold on!” She strutted down the alleyway, at a leisurely pace from her perspective, and at a blistering speed from your perspective. You were terrified at first, but once you got used to it, you were stunned by the view from the woman’s giant shoulder.

You could just barely see over the roofs of nearby buildings, giving you a great view of the town below. The empty streets, huge cars and abandoned stores were tiny in comparison to the canine woman’s impressive size.

“Wow…” you breathe, and Fran smiles warmly, glad that you’re enjoying yourself. The trip back to the apartment was a lot shorter with Franziska’s size, but it still took quite a while, and during the trip, you silently considered what the woman had said before.

“Hey, Fran...” you ask, realizing something. “You said unhypnotized males have a bounty on their head. Do you know how much that bounty is?”

“A lot. Enough cash to buy this entire city,” Franziska explains. “Why?”

You were silent for a moment. “When we first met, and you realized I hadn’t been hypnotized… why didn’t you turn me in?” you ask, and Fran gives you a weird look.

“Why would I?” Franziska retorted, curtly, as if trying to change the subject.

“If you handed me in to the queen, you could’ve been the richest woman on Earth,” you say, staying focused. “Why did you throw that all away just to help some boy you’ve never even met?” You could tell that this was an issue Fran didn’t want to talk about. You detected that she might have trouble opening up emotionally.

“That wouldn’t be very polite of me, would it?” Franziska said, but she could tell that wasn’t going to be a satisfying answer. With a sigh, she finally decides to just tell the truth.

“... the Queen treats her slaves terribly. She has no respect or mercy for anyone. You wouldn’t survive a day,” she explains, begrudgingly, almost whispering. “I know I mess around a lot, but… you’re just a kid, y’know? I don’t actually want to see anything bad happen to you.”

“I didn’t want to show it at first, but when I saw you walking around, alone, tired and hungry, I… felt really bad for you,” she admits. “The queen stole your whole world right out from under you. I can’t imagine how scary and confusing that must’ve been. You don’t deserve any of what happened to you.”

She gives you a solemn look. “So… there you go. That’s my full explanation. Happy now?”

“Uh… yeah, Fran,” you say, a bit stunned by her explanation. You sit there in silence for a while. You could tell Fran had an easy life here, with expensive food, a huge apartment, and no apparent need to work. And now, she was throwing it all on the line to help you take down the queen. Just that realization made your eyes tear up a bit, but you wiped it away before she noticed. “That… that means a lot.”

With that, she continued on her path, and the both of you were glad you got that out of your system. You weren’t entirely trustful of Fran before, but now you knew you could trust her with anything.
153232121111.title: On Fran's Shoulder

1532321211112.content:
“I can’t wait to get back to the apartment,” she smiles, admiring her newly-acquired weapon. “I have a display mounted on my wall for just this occasion.”

“Have you been planning for this for a long time?” you ask.

“Oh, yeah. Like I said, I always wanted to get my hands on one of these things,” she smiles, and then gleefully pats her muscular belly. “And I always wanted to see what it would feel like to get my jaws around that cat.”

You shudder, remembering what happened to that alien in the alleyway. The whole situation was unnerving… but also strangely fascinating. “Hm…?” you say curiously, without thinking. “How did that… feel…?” You regret those words as soon as they come out of your mouth.

Fran pauses, staring at you with a sly smirk on her face for a few moments, before eventually deciding not to tease you too much. “Best snack ever. Swallowing her just felt so… natural. Like my predator instincts were kicking in. Though it was kind of weird to feel her wriggling around in my stomach,” she reminisces, before turning her huge head around to look at you. “I really ought to do stuff like that more often. Why, are you volunteering?”

“N-NO!” you stand up and loudly insist, only for Fran to burst out laughing at your reaction. Blushing, you sit back down on her massive shoulder.

“Relax! I’m just messing around,” she laughs. She continues walking at a leisurely pace through the town, pausing every once in awhile to admire the sights while you lounge on her furry shoulder. After all that planning you’ve been doing, it was nice to just relax a bit.

“So… how are we going to meet this friend of yours?” you ask, absentmindedly, but Fran frowns.

“Oh yeah, about that…” she sighs. “Tomorrow, we’re going to an odd little… meetup, of the city’s wealthiest women.”

“What’s wrong?” you ask. “You’re saying that like it’s a bad thing.”

“Well, the only way I can get in is if I can ‘prove’ I’m wealthy. And these days, male slaves are kind of an expensive status symbol...” she explains, and gives you an apologetic look. “So… if we’re going to get in, you’re going to have to pretend to be my, uhh, ‘servant’.”

“What?” you say, a little surprised.

“It sounds bad, but it won’t be that hard, trust me!” Fran insists. “You just have to pretend to be hypnotized. You won’t even have to say anything, most of the time. Just do whatever anyone tells you to do.”

You try not to show your nervousness. Having to pretend to be a hypnotized little slave, in front of an entire party full of massive aliens… you shudder at the thought! Even a single wrong move at this party could blow your cover. “But I’m terrible at acting…” you say, trying to come up with some kind of excuse to get out of this.

She frowns. “I know this is a lot to ask, but if we want to get into that ship, this is our best shot,” she tries to calm you down. “We might even get a new ally! How does that sound?”

You nod. You didn’t want to admit it, but she was right. You knew taking down the Queen would be a long, difficult process, but if wanted to have your world back, you had to be brave. “... alright…” you sigh. Franziska tilts her head, still looking a little concerned.

“Hey, you won’t be as effective if you’re so stressed out all the time,” she stops in he tracks, as she makes an offer. “Instead of going right back to the apartment, why don’t we go somewhere else around town -- have some fun?”

You try of thinking of something fun to this in this post-apocalyptic city, but your mind draws a blank. Maybe the zoo? No, way too dangerous. “What is there to do?” you ask.

“Well, everyone’s on the mothership, so we can go pretty much anywhere we want,” she smiles. “There’s a big swimming pool nearby that’s literally been abandoned. We can have it all to ourselves.” She ponders, thinking up more options. “Or we can go to the mall. It’s been abandoned too, so you can pretty much grab whatever you want for free.”

You ponder it. At first, the emptiness of the town was eerie, but now that you think about it, the prospect of having most of the city to yourself sounds kind of exciting.
1532321211112.title: Out on the Town with a Giantess

choices: Franziska tried to fire on the guard
Franziska turned the ray on herself
15323212112.content:
Before you could get away, you felt her long tail wrap around your neck. You shout out in shock as she pulled you towards her.

"Gotcha!" she shouted. She threateningly held her baton up to your neck, a cruel grin painted on her face. "Queen' got a biiiiiig bounty on you, boy!" Over her shoulder, you saw Franziska coming out of wherever she was, holding what you figured to be the size ray. You unintentionally smiled as you saw her aim towards the guard. Unfortunately, the guard noticed your strange change in demeanor. She looked over her shoulder, and saw Franziska aiming at her. She whipped around, putting you between her and the dog. At this, Franziska whipped the ray towards the sky, sending a ray to the atmosphere.

{c:green)"Either you're a worse shot than I thought, or you weren't aiming for this squirt," she said.

"I think the sun got in my eye there," Franziska tried to lie.

"Enough lying, I could shout and you'll be swarmed. I could have all sorts of tech focused on you. Freeze rays, turn you into putty, it won't matter what you do with that. Whatever you do here, I could have you punished for as long as possible." You could swear you saw the ray shake a bit in her hand.

"So I don't have anything to lose then!"

"Tsk, tsk. We could forget what happened here. I'll bring this kid to Queen, she'll deal with him, and you and the rest of the crew are gonna seek out any stragglers or any bits of this society Queen will want to sell off to the highest bidder. All you have to do is drop. That. Gun!"

"And how can I trust you!?"

"Do you think you've got a chance here?" As Franziska turned the gun towards what you figured to be exposed bits of the guard, she moved you around such that you kept between her and the ray. It seemed like Franziska couldn't get a clean shot on her. "This is your only chance of avoiding comeuppance. There are few officers willing to let something like this slide. Act smart for once, girl." You could only watch on in horror. Everything was going wrong, and you had no idea what was going to happen. Was Franziska going to leave you now? Could you even get away?
15323212112.title: She grabs you!

choices: A huge drop of warm drool lands on your head, uh oh, don’t look up
A large shadow creeps up behind you, do you dare turn around
154.content:
You decide to head out for the glacier. Despite the stories you’ve heard about her going to the glacier to resurrect ancient beasts to do her bidding, which you don’t buy, it is also a fairly cold and empty place. If the rumors about the glaciers are true, and you’re pretty sure they are, it’ll make a great new hiding spot. No one will dare bother you in the cold, icy tundra, and the stories of dinosaurs and other monstrous creatures will keep intruders away. It was perfect.

You set out bright and early for your trip to the glaciers. After a decent, hour-long trip through the city and avoiding Queen’s followers you make it to the glaciers. A cold gust of wind blows past you. You start to go searching for a place to set up shelter until something interrupts you.
154.title: The glacier

choices: A trex staring hungrily at you
A mammoth staring hungrily at you
1541.content: You feel a large glob of slobber fall onto you, staining you from your shoulder to your hair. You freeze up in both terror and disgust. Before you can wipe it off, you feel something drag their tongue from your butt to your head, shoving you forward a bit. You can't stop your curiosity, you look up and find...
1541.title: A huge drop of warm drool lands on your head, u...

choices: She slaps you around with her massive tongue and burps on you
15411.content:
You look up slowly and fearfully, to see exactly what dropped that drool on you. Just before you can make out what the creature is another massive drop of hot drool lands on your face. You shriek in disgust as you try to wipe it away, “Ew, gross!” Once all the mucky drool is wiped away you look up, wide eyed at a massive, female T-Rex who seems to be grinning widely at you with a devious look on her face. Then, she speaks, “Well, don’t we look tasty today.” You chuckle nervously as you see her fat, pink tongue lick her lips, “Sorry but I think I gotta run. I think I hear my mom calling me, I’m probably late for lunch.”

You start to cautiously walk away until the T-Rex puts her massive scaly leg in your way as she gives you a sassy laugh, “Oh don’t worry, I think you’re right on time for lunch.” You shriek in fear as the dinosaur opens her mouth nice and wide, her mouth comes down on you and she wraps her lips around your waist before slurping up your kicking legs lick noodles. Now you land with a plop onto her gross, slimy tongue, you look around the big, pink mouth, fearfully trying to think of a way to escape.
15411.title: A trex staring hungrily at you

choices: She spits you out for more fun
154111.content:
You crawl about the dinosaur's tongue, terrified at your position, and disgusted by the horrible smell permeating her mouth. Before you could consider a way out, her tongue slides out from under you, and you're slapped against the inside of her right cheek. She scoops her tongue around the inside of her right cheek, hooking around you, and she drags you against the other cheek. A few hundred meters down the gentle slope was a small camp. Two large domes, alien in nature, sat side by side, a large tube connecting them. Next to this habitat was a strange looking device. It looked a little like a futuristic oil derrick, a long rod slowly moving up and down at the heart of the construction. Clanking and loud humming gave the scene a very suspicious lookout. Perhaps this was what had caused all of the monster stories. You try to sneak closer and find out when of the domes opens up. Through the door steps a familiar figure. It's the Queen! What the hell was she doing here? You dive down into the snow, hoping against hope that she didn't see you. The purple skunk-like alien is clad in simple robes, seemingly unfased by the harsh cold. She doesn't seem to notice you and walks to the machine. A few pressed buttons later the humming continues at a much lower pitch.

"At long last the ancient prehistoric powers buried in this glacier will be mine. I shall attain their strength and with it I will conquer the galaxy!"

The machine whirred and hummed loudly as a peculiar looking device was removed from it. The Queen's tail twitched as she caressed the smooth surface. Wires hung of one end of the device, but the other half was completely free of any protrusions. She put her feet apart a little and promptly slipped her hand into her robes. The skunk alien pushed the device in and with a loud SHLK she probed herself with it. With everything in place she flipped a switch on the machine and it whirred into action. Each of her fingers looked to be about the size of your whole body. You could only guess at her exact new size, but you were in no rush to get any closer to find out. You're lying on your belly in the snow, only barely covered in a snowdrift. Do you stay put and hope she doesn't see you or do you try to run for it?

The rest of your life was spent amusing the Queen in whichever ways she could dream of. Be it serving as a snack, a toy or just a stressball, you were hers to use, abuse and discard as she saw fit. Her giant stature mercifully meant your end was almost always swift, followed up by a revitalizing surge of energy as the nightmarish alien machine just brought you back to serve her again. 1553211.content: Ahead of you, you saw a gray wolfess. She was dressed up as...
1553211.title: A wolfess dressed as Zelda

15532111.content:
The wolfess before you bore gray fur, wore a blue and white shirt, wore a pair of brown pants, and wore leather boots. Part of you could understand why she'd choose this Zelda, considering how much in accentuated the- ahem- rear and bust. She turned towards the two of you.

"Say hello to your partner!" the mouse said as she set you before her.

"Hiya!" she greeted enthusiastically. She held out a hand for you, prompting you to shake. Fearful about stirring up trouble, you reached up and shook.

"Now, keep in mind, this guy will be shown off to other cosplayers here," the mouse said. "So, whatever you want to do, you should do it fast." With that, she scrambled away, leaving you alone with her. The wolfess seemed upset at the announcement that she had limited time with you. But, it seemed she was fast thinking about what to do with you.

1553221.content:
The outfit was electric yellow with brownish strips on the back. It consisted of a yellow onsie, and a pair of ears matching the Pikachu. The onsie had a tail extending out of the back, red spots on the cheek, a tiny nose, and a pair of bead-like eyes. Of course, this must've been Pikachu.

"Nice choice! C'mon, let me take you somewhere!" the mouse lady said, grabbing your wrist. She began dragging you out of the room, towards the main halls. Down there, you saw tons upon tons of people dressed strangely. You saw a few human women, a few anthro women, and they all seemed to be checking out each other's costumes. You caught a few ladies turning towards you with a certain twinkle in their eyes.

Soon, you realized the mouse was bringing you towards...
1553221.title: ...a Pikachu
