15532211.title: ...a human dressed like a Pokemon trainer

choices: A bunny dressed as a lopunny
15532213.content: The mouse is bring you to
15532213.title: ...someone else

choices: You go to the Renaissance fair
You go to the strip club
15533.content:
You recently heard about the Renaissance fair and night club.

Before the invasion came up, a Renaissance fair was being set up. After the invasion, you heard that the aliens apparently procured the equipment to have a bit of an affair themselves. Some aliens and some humans are dressed up like knights, but the defining feature of the fair is the ginormous dragoness in place. The fair was used to feed some humans dressed up as knights to the dragoness as part of some mock play for Queen. She'd apparently revel at the knights' failed attempts at overcoming the dragon. Of course, you'd have to worry about other Knights or other Renaissance figures if you were to go down there.

Then there's the night club. You're hardly old enough to go there, but those rules don't really matter right now. Ever since the invasion, the night club got insanely popular. But very little is known about it. All that's known is a bunch of humans are brought in and never taken out, and the club's popular with the aliens for some reason.

Where to?
15533.title: Somewhere else

choices: A knight on a feral horse spots you
A group of knights spot you
You reach the throne with little trouble
155331.content:
You felt like the fair might see the most action for now.

Upon arriving, you spied many aliens dressed up like knights and male humans dressed like jesters. The knight armor looked normal, except for some super tough, rubber-y material replacing some of the metal over the butt and breasts, clinging to them and showing off their full splendor, right down to the nipples and camel toe. Elsewhere, you saw an elaborate throne, many alien knights surrounding it. You couldn't see the person sitting on the throne, but you were sure it was Queen.

Many jesters were forced to stand in a ring in front of the throne, and for a devious reason. A dragoness, the size of a tower, flew down towards them. The jesters cowered in fear before the dragoness devoured then, one by one. The knights cheered on the jesters' "sacrifice," and began to mock fight the giant lizard. You were disgusted by this whole ordeal. You figured you'd approach that throne, first and foremost.
155331.title: You go to the Renaissance fair

1553311.content:
“Halt!”

You hardly even made it a few yards before one of the wandering knights spotted you. You turned to look at your captor; a seven-foot tall canine of some sort, wielding some sort of modified sasumata-like weapon. Her long, straight hair dripped out the bottom of her kettle helm, and she had a surprisingly regal expression on her face, for an anthro. This was downplayed by the fact that her armor seemed completely impractical, obviously designed more for showing off her cleavage than protecting her; then again, she probably wasn’t planning on fighting any actual battles. She was just trained to catch humans… and to this end, she rode on the back of the largest horse you’d ever seen. At around ten feet tall from its hooves to its withers, the curvaceous mare towered over you, almost more intimidating than the knight herself.

“Human, by order of the Queen, I demand you surrender yourself at once!” The knight demanded, and you froze in place, looking up at her. With her huge horse, she could obviously beat you in speed if you tried to flee… but you were at a fair. There were buildings all around; buildings that huge mare would never be able to fit inside. You just had to make it to one of them, and you were free. With that thought, you immediately break out into a full sprint towards the closest stall you see. “Rosey! Onwards!” The knight commanded, and the horse began to run after you. Despite your head start, you heard the huge hoofsteps beat closer you at a terrifying rate… and before you knew it, the horse-riding knight was only a couple yards behind you, her sasumata aimed to wrap around your neck.

Do you make it to the stall?
1553311.title: The Cavalry

choices: The knight comes back to the horse and either gets you or forgets about you
You sink in further up the horse's rear as the Knight stays occupied
Another knight comes by and notices you...
15533112.content:
Despite your best efforts, you felt something clamp down around your neck from the back, causing you to panic for a bit before you wore yourself out. The scantily clad knight then lifts you up with her weapon with ease as she pulls you in for a closer look while having a smug look on her face.

"Did you really think you could go far human? If the Queen won't punish you for this, I will myself

She said with a teasing chuckle

}"Think it's about time to take you back to the Queen...

After this, she lifts you up and seems to be bringing you up to the horse's back...until you see she is taking you towards the curvy mare's butt!

As soon as the smell hits you, you hear the knight chuckle at your squirms

"What's the matter? This is where I put human captives!"

You panic at this and make one last attempt before she drops you, causing to sink in deep between the mare's butt cheeks. The sweat makes it pretty easy for you to slide in deep enough till your vision is blocked off by the big butt cheeks along with the horse's tail. You also cringe as the back of your head rubs on the horse's sweaty pucker..."

"Alright Rosey, we got another one, time to head back to the Queen..."

As the horse begins to move, you cringe as the butt cheeks start to knead over you, starting to soften you up as the knight heads back. Occasionally, the curvy mare would silently break wind over you as she trots, causing you to gag between the sweaty butt cheeks, unnoticed by the oblivious knight...

many minutes, and farts, later, the Knight finally nears the building where the Queen is and proceeds to hope off the horse before heading in...

Back between the butt cheeks, you continue to gag on the fumes that the horse releases. You then felt the butt cheeks shake before the pucker opens up a little before you and sucks a little of your head in...you hope the knight comes back before the horse does something...
15533112.title: No

choices: The three agree to dress you as a jestter
The three agree to dress you as a knight
The three agree to dress you as a prince
1553312.content:
"What've we got here?" you heard someone say next to you. You felt a cold shiver run down your spine, and you looked over to the source. Like you feared, the owner was one of those cat knights. You heard someone move near your other side, and you looked, spying another cat knight.

"Looks like we've got a late arrival on our hands," the other cat said. You heard another one walk up behind you, and you didn't even bother to look to confirm any sort of suspicion. The three picked you up, and began marching towards what was once a dress store. They went through the doors, and brought you close to some gear.

"A little joker like this oughta look the part," one cat said. She began to drag you towards a bunch of clothes resembling jester outfits.

"No, it'd be a lot funnier to see him play knight and fail," another cat said. She brought you towards clothes made to look like knight armor. It sounded like neither option was good for you. Either you were to dress as a jester and get eaten by a dragoness, or you were to "fight" a dragon, and most likely get eaten. Unfortunately, either of those choices may have been worse than what the other cat had in store.

"You know, I don't think we've seen anyone rescue a damsel in distress from the dragon," the third cat said, dragging you towards an outfit that looks like something a prince would wear. "How's that sound, little guy? You get to hang back in the dragoness' grasp, wait for one of us knights to save you, and then you and that knight can live happily ever after." Somehow, that sounded just a little worse. Not that the choices mattered considering your "choice" was completely subject to the cats.
1553312.title: A group of knights spot you

15533123.content:
"I feel like Queen will enjoy seeing her subjects saving the prince," one of the cats said. They all nodded in confirmation, and you gulped in fear. The rest of the giggled at the idea, and rushed you to a changing room while one of them grabbed the outfit. You were forced past a curtain, which could barely fit the knights. They scrambled to yank off your clothes, you unable to fight back. You felt the air hit your naked body and tried to cover up. But, just as quickly as you felt naked, you were suddenly in new clothes.

You looked down at your outfit. You wore a navy blue tunic, beige tights, and a crown fit for a prince. Of course, the crown was just plastic.

"Oh, don't he look fit for a royal rescue?" one of the cats said as if she were looking at a pup.

"Absolutely, prime dragon bait," another said. You tried to run away, but they grabbed you and marched you out. You couldn't fight them, and soon you found yourself on a throne. The guards all surrounded you, ensuring that you couldn't move. Then, you heard a loud trumpeting nearby, and saw a few aliens tossing flower petals near a door. Said door opened, and out came... Queen? Sure enough, out came the skunk herself, Queen. She wore a queen-ly crown, and a red, regal robe, decorated with fine jewelry. She waved to the crowd, and spied you, flashing a slight smirk.

Soon, she got to her seat, a grand, golden throne. You wanted to do something now, but the other guards would stop you. Soon, Queen began to speak.

"My fine subjects, I welcome you to my kingdom!" she declared. "I can't imagine how many of you must've been thrust into the homeless lifestyle when a grand alien force stole your planets away from you. I saw this world, and saw a grand capital for life to thrive! These humans, however... they stood in that path." You winced at her lie. When she arrived, she acted nice for the cameras. Then she suddenly deployed her evil plan.

"However, I see a human has arrived amongst us. I thank you for approaching us, and I wish to negotiate a deal with you." You wanted to curse her out, to rake her across the coals, but a flapping overhead interrupted you. "Hark! What be that sound I hear over yonder?" She sounded like she was exaggerating her acting. She knew exactly what was going to happen. You saw the source of it, a giant figure flying through the air. Then, they descended, fast. You saw several guards get into position.

With the thunderous noise of an explosion, the dragon slammed down. She bore ruby red scales, a noticeable bosom at her chest area, though she seemed to stick to her four-legged posture. Some male guards approached, but she quickly swallowed them up, and smacked other guards away easily. Then, she approached you. The other guards suddenly ran, but before you could run, her jaws suddenly jutted towards you. Her fangs wrapped around your tunic, and lifted you up. She began flying away, towards a grand tower. Now, someone else would have to "save" you. Who though?
15533123.title: The three agree to dress you as a prince

choices: An alien realizes you're in the ventilation
155332.content:
You decided to check out the strip club. You weren't sure why Queen was there, but you had this urge to go there. And that decision totally isn't fueled by a rebellious desire to look somewhere you're not supposed to. You snuck through the streets, and eventually found your way near the strip club. The entrance was guarded by two vixens with wine-red fur. They both wore rubber latex suits that clung to their bodies tightly. You could see the nipples poking the suits. They seemed to be watching the entrance.

You saw a couple of cat ladies escorting 5 males. They each looked like they used to be part of your class. The two cats got to the entrance, and the vixens let them through. The cats let the 5 enter the building before leaving and heading elsewhere. You were worried to think about what could possibly be happening in there. You knew going through the entrance was out of the question, unless you wanted to personally meet the fate of those people sent in. There are probably more people past the entrance to escort the humans, so you don't imagine doing anything about the bouncers would help much.

You need to find some sort of secret entrance. Maybe a vent. You found a ventilation shaft, and pulled the cover off. You began to crawl through. As you crawled in, you got to a branch, either straight ahead or right. You pondered which way you should go.
155332.title: You go to the strip club

choices: You go after the alien with the "him's"
Before you can decide, an alien walks in on you
1553321.content:
You decide to head straight ahead. You crawl forward, hoping you aren't getting enough attention. As you moved forward, you looked out the side of the vent, and saw the inside of the nightclub. The inside was low lit and full of aliens drinking alcohol. There were also a few females in the crowd. You saw some ladies dressed very scantily, dancing around a pole. You also saw a few males stripping down in front of a hollering and whistling alien crowd. You shuddered at the thought of what these aliens are putting these guys through. You also couldn't see the classmates brought in before.

You continued crawling forward, and found yourself peaking into another room. It looked like a bedroom with a queen-sized bed. Standing at the foot is a red vixen dressed only in lingerie. Standing before her were the classmates from before. The fox held a clipboard and a pen. You had no clue what she was doing. You then noticed a couple of cat ladies standing on either ide of them.

"Him... Him... Not him... Not him... Him..." the fox said, pointing at each of the classmates. One alien took the three "him's," and another took the two "not him's". The "him's" were taken out the room, while the "not him's" were brought to a room titled "Training." They then left, without those classmates. The vixen began to walk towards the "Training" room, and the room was empty. You opened up the vent, and stepped out. You were worried about what was going on with your classmate. You began to ponder which ones might be in more danger right now.
1553321.title: You go straight

choices: You go onto the dance floor
Something's crawling through the vents with you
1553322.content:
You decide to head right. You crawled forward, and you began to hear loud, bass heavy music as you went forward. Soon, you reached a grating near the source of the noise, and were able to look into the room. The room was giant, had low lighting, and lavender lighting. A gentle fog swept through, which was lit up purple. The room was filled with many ladies, human and alien. Almost all of them wore bright, tight, a short clothing. You saw a few up on the poles, dancing around like no one was watching.

The source of the noise was over on stage, where you spied a DJ station. And behind it was a great, big, white horse, who bounced on her chair to the beat of her own song. She wore black booty shorts with a white musical note on either thigh, and a shiny purple overcoat, nothing underneath. You figured you'd need to find some lead here. But how?
1553322.title: You go right

choices: Watch the show until the Queen shows up
Search through the staff rooms to find something to take her down with
15533222.content:
The loud music and low lighting made it easy for you to slip out of the air vent and onto the dancefloor. You snuck your way into a small side room, hoping you'd find something to help you blend in. Compared to the short clothing of all the partygoers, your scruffy pants and sweater stood out like a sore thumb. You thank your lucky stars as you seem to have barged into an empty staff dressing room. Before someone can find you and get suspicious, you throw off your old clothes and put on a pair of dark, short pants and a shirt labeled 'staff'. Hopefully this would deter most partygoers from thinking you were a prop to abuse in this party. With your newfound look, a bold plan formed. If you needed to know more about the Queen, why not just ask? With all the confidence you can muster you walk up to the horse and tap her on her thigh. She stopped bouncing in her chair for a moment and looked down at you, seemingly surprised. Before she could ask you a thing, you speak up, yelling a little to be heard over the music.

"Hey, when do we prepare the party for the Queen? I heard she was coming tonight and I got orders to get a big pile of drudges ready for her."

Flustered by your forwardness and ability to form full sentences the horse responds: "Um... she should arrive in two hours." You thank her and start walking away, but you don't get far before a large hand rests on your shoulder, stopping you.

"Hold on a moment. What's going on here? Drudges aren't usually this... talkative." She looks to her chair and shuffles her butt from side to side. You didn't see him, but you were certain some unfortunate soul was in there, acting as her pillow. You had to think fast, before she might consider putting you beneath her butt too.

"I'm a newer model drudge. Still completely at your orders, ma'am. But also able to do a little more on my own so you don't have to keep an eye on me as much. The Queen is rolling us out to see how the general populace responds and without meaning to boast, my efforts have been appreciated."

"Huh, someone shoulda told me that earlier. Sounds interesting enough. I hope you're still as comfy as the old models, though." Again she ground her butt into her chair, further tormenting whoever was in there. You had to pick your words carefully, before she decides to squash you for a test run.

"Like I said, my efforts have been appreciated. But can I suggest we save that for later? I've got to take care of the drudges and make sure they're ready to entertain the Queen during her visit." The horse DJ still had some difficulty with your story. She wasn't sure she liked the idea of a human talking back to her. But the show had to go on, and she knew how much the Queen enjoyed her little man-toys during the show. There'd be plenty of time after tonight's show to test out this new drudge. For now she waves you away, commanding you to get on with your business. You nod with a smile, walking back towards the staff room. It was still empty, allowing you to let out a massive sigh of relief. You laugh to yourself, amazed that your bluff worked. You now knew that the Queen herself would show up on the dance floor in two hours. You didn't really have any ideas on how to take her down, but you had the next two hours to think of something. What do you do next?
15533222.title: You check out the DJ

choices: You sneak close to the Queen
The Queen or the DJ spot you
155332221.content:
You wait a little bit in the staff room before returning to the party. You were no closer to finding a way of taking down the Queen, but you were confident in your creativity. You'd think of something. You stay well away from the horse DJ, knowing that if she'd see you, there'd be more questions. From the corner of the dance floor you watch the show. The humans dancing around the poles were gyrating in ways you'd never seen before. The alien dancers too were into it. Suddenly the music dimmed and the horse spoke loudly.

"Alright everyone, you've shown us some great moves, but now it's time for the drudges to show us how it's done." The soundtrack switched to circus music and half a dozen drudges were pushed onto the stage. Each of the men went to their own pole and began to shuffle around it. Laughter erupted from all the people on the dancefloor. You had to keep yourself from showing any pity for these men, lest your cover might be blown. The sad display was painful to watch. The pheromone-addled men were sluggish and clumsy, often falling down when trying to dance around the poles.

Six of the seven poles on stage were occupied. It seemed strange to you that they'd push out a drudge too few, but the DJ quickly filled in the blanks. She rose to her feet, reached behind her and threw the miserable heap of a man she'd been sitting on onto the stage. "Go on, cushion, dance for me!" He barely even moved, wracked with pain from having the horse bounce on his body for who knows how long. She seemed amused enough by the spectacle, letting the men further humiliate themselves on stage.

"Impressive footwork, gentlemen. But I'm afraid we dance a little differently around here. Ladies, give them a good time! And someone, return my cushion to me!"

Several aliens and human women from the crowd took up the challenge, climbing onto the stage and approaching the 'dancing' drudges. It quickly became clear that they weren't going to play nice. A curvy human woman walked up to a pole, grabbing the drudge and pressing his back against the smooth metal. She simply performed her routine, seemingly not caring there was someone in the way and crushing him between her large body and the rigid pole. The other drudges didn't fare much better. The show looked less like a dance and more like a wrestling match. Each of the ladies assailed the drudges, sitting on them, crushing them with their thighs and humiliating them by squeezing them amidst a creative little dance. The DJ's pillow was picked up and thrown back to its owner, who wasted no time shoving him back into her seat and burying him beneath her round buttcheeks.

As the drudges became increasingly beat up they were thrown into the partying crowd. Whenever one went flying hands went in the air, eager to catch the unfortunate man. The moment they caught one he vanished beneath the waves of partygoers, no doubt being bullied even further. You were suddenly extremely happy to be wearing a staff shirt as a disguise, since several aliens and human women also looked at you as a potential source of fun. Time flew by, the dancing never abating unless it was time to send another group of drudges onto the stage to be humiliated. It was hard to watch the pain these men endured, but you would have your shot at ending their suffering soon. Suddenly the crowd went ballistic, bursting into loud cheering and applause.

"Ladies and drudges! Your Queen has entered the house! Everyone give her a big hand. Who would've thought the invasion would be this succesful? Now let's party!!" The horse DJ yelled ecstatically. You saw her head poke out from the crowd, as well as that unnaturally long tail of hers. There could be no doubt, that was the Queen. Never before had you been this close to her and nobody seemed the least bit suspect about your presence. Time to enact your plan and overthrow this tyrant once and for all.
155332221.title: Watch the show until the Queen shows up

choices: Check out the door with no label on it
155332222.content:
You decided you need to find something to fight Queen with. She's renown for her intense power, reported to've bearhugged a tank into pieces. No way you could stand up to that! Now, first, you've gotta find something that'll help you out. But where could you look?

Maybe they have some sort security equipment in this security room? You see a door in the back labeled "Fun," and you have no idea what could be back there. Peeking out of the door, you can see a path towards a bar. Maybe someone there could help you overcome her? You see another door, on one of the other walls, except it has no labels.
155332222.title: Search through the staff rooms to find somethin...

155333.content:
You realize with a start that you’ve been pondering your plan for too long. You’d be found if you stayed here for too long. You sneak up the alley and glanced up and down the block, trying to find a building that seemed like a good place to hide out for a while.

The closest building was an old massage parlor that looks like it has been completely renovated and repurposed by the aliens. A sign outside now read ‘Vixen’s Leisure’, and the window advertised goods and services that were completely unfamiliar to you. Still, at a glance, it looked relatively empty.
155333.title: Go elsewhere

1553331.content:
You sneak into the building, only to immediately find yourself staring right into the eyes of the anthropomorphic vixen behind the counter. She was stark naked, as you’d expect, but thankfully her thick red fur effectively hid her erogenous zones and lent her some dignity. She had the perfect, curvy hourglass figure that was common amongst anthros, with full breasts and thick thighs almost drawing attention away from her toned, sylphlike belly. You would definitely find her attractive, if she wasn’t eight feet tall and covered in fur. “Well hello there, little man. Did your mistress send you here to get some R&R?” she smiled a sly smile, spotting you before you had the chance to run. Frozen like a deer in headlights, you definitely couldn’t flee now; she didn’t seem immediately hostile, so you just had to act natural. You nod, trying your hardest to maintain eye contact, looking into her piercing, fox-like eyes.

“Well ain’t that just so nice of her,” she giggled. You can tell she doesn’t get too many males in her little business. “Who, exactly, is your mistress, pray tell?

“S-she wishes to remain… anonymous,” you lie without thinking, your heart racing.

She gives you a weird look, as if confused or incredulous. “Hmm… well, if you say so,” she says, her tone indecipherable. “Now what did she send you in for?” You take a quick glance at the board behind her. Most of the services offered here seemed to be exclusive to women (no surprise there), but you did spot a couple for males. Trying to act confident, you asked for a…
1553331.title: Enter the former parlor

15533312.content:
For some reason, the second you said those words, the vixen perked up. Apparently, this was a service she was particularly passionate about. You weren’t too worried, though. Isolation tanks are supposed to be pretty safe, and they could even serve as a great hiding space for a couple hours. You just hope the vixen doesn’t try to pull anything. She can’t harm you if she thinks you’re owned by someone else, right? “Ooh! How exciting,” she said, standing up and leading you into another room. “Right this way, sir!” You ponder if you should run, but decide to just follow the vixen, hesitantly. You wonder how she can afford to keep the counter unattended, but you guess stores don’t get much business after the apocalypse.

A few massage tables still stuck around, but beyond that, the parlor had been transformed into an unrecognizable labyrinth. She eventually led you into a room at the very back of the building, which to your surprise, turned out to be her bedroom. “Uhh… where’s the tank?” you asked, glancing around the seemingly irrelevant room.

“Right here,” she smirked, patting her belly. Before you registered what she said, the powerful vixen had grabbed you by both shoulders, and you were staring deep into the dark chasm of her throat. Your whole world went dark in an instant, as you felt her vulpine lips stretch around your face. Your entire head rested on the tongue in the 8-foot tall woman’s giant maw, as she took you by your arms are forced your forehead up against her throat. It stretched readily to accommodate you; and before you knew it, her powerful throat muscles were pressing tight around your head, undulating around you and pulling you deeper. Your torso was now resting in her maw, her lips easily restraining your arms to your sides.

You were stunned completely. You knew the aliens had strange and unnatural powers, but you had never considered anything like this to be possible. The vixen was twice your size, but could she really swallow you completely with such ease? You were so paralyzed you didn’t even try to struggle when the vixen lifted your body up in the air, letting gravity slide your torso into her wet throat. Your heart leaped in your chest as your head suddenly plunged deeper into the darkness. Around the time you were waist-deep in her throat, you finally started to kick your feet in an attempt to escape; of course, by this point, it was far too late. Your head was already starting to enter her toned gut, and your legs were being pushed into her throat.

Eventually, your entire upper body was being pushed into the vixen’s stomach, as it bulged out to fit your small body, temporarily ruining her hourglass figure. You flinched as she sent her tongue along your bare feet, before finally taking that one last gulp, sealing you entirely away inside her large, voluptuous body. You were dumped unceremoniously into her belly like a common piece of food, the sac stretching out to impossible sizes to contain you. It was completely dark inside of her, and your lower body was submerged in a few inches of strange warm liquids. The vixen let out an ear-shattering burp as her throat was finally clear, and her prey was tucked firmly away in her stomach. Satisfied, she collapsed on her bed, and you felt her gently rub and knead her huge, sensitive belly.

As you finally got a moment of quiet to ponder the situation, you felt like you were on the verge of tears. You watched your clothes slowly start to burn away, and you knew what her stomach was going to do to you. You didn’t how long it would take; maybe dozens of terrible, agonizing hours. You were never going to see your family and friends again, never defeat the queen and save the world. You had failed. You look back on your life, and all the little moments; the happy times, the sad times, the laughter and the tears… and you realize this is the last experience you’ll ever have. After everything you’ve been through, this how you’re going to die; in agony and terror, alone in the dark…

Except… you don't feel alone. And you're not in any pain, either.

It was actually rather relaxing in here. It was actually surprisingly quite roomy, providing more than enough space for you to stretch around and get comfortable. The light sway from the vixen’s every moment provided a bit of a swadling effect, which gradually eased your restless mind. But most of all, everything was… quiet. More quiet than you’ve ever experienced. Living in the big city, you were used to the constant noise of cars, birds and people. But here, not only was it completely dark, the only thing you could hear was the regular, soft beating of the vixen’s heart.

Suddenly, you can hear a elegant, velvety voice breaks the silence. “Is everything alright in there, darling?” the vixen asks, her whispers sounding like they’re emanating from all around you. “You’ll completely ruin the experience if you just wriggle around the whole time.”

“A-are you going to d-digest me?” you managed to choke out, a bit startled. You didn’t know the vixen could still communicate with you.

“Heavens no! Why, I’d be out of business!” the vixen says, sounding both surprised and amused in equal measures. “I will let you out long before my stomach acids become painful for you. The purpose of this experience is relaxation.”

“Y-you want me to relax?” you ask, almost in disbelief.

“Why, of course,” she says, and you feel her send a calming hand rubbing gently over her belly, as if trying to console you. “Just a brief respite from the anxieties of everyday life. Just let yourself go, and soon, your problems will seem meaningless! It’s calming being inside of me, is it not?”

You were loathe to admit it, but she was right. Her stomach was not only the most bizarre place you’ve ever been, it was also the most relaxing. Most of your senses were dulled completely, leaving you only with the soothing sound of the woman’s heart beat. You decide to heed her advice, finding a position in which you’re comfortable and holding still, concentrating on the sound of her heart. As you lost yourself to relaxation, you began to enter an almost dream-like trance. The divisions between consciousness and unconsciousness blurred. You felt completely weightless, like you were floating in an infinite void. Hours felt like seconds and seconds felt like hours. For the first time all week, you were able to simply forget the horrifying cataclysm that had befallen your world. It felt like all the tension and anxiety you’ve been feeling was seeping out from your pores…

Now that you had calmed down, the vixen stands up shakily, carrying your weight with surprising ease. She walks dutifully back to the counter at the front of the parlor, leaning back in her chair as she enjoyed her incredible expanded gut. It was a very quiet day today, so the vixen just sat at her counter, gently rubbing her belly and enjoying the weight in her stomach. It wasn’t often that she got to do this, and she wanted to make it last. It seems like you were going to be in there for a while...
15533312.title: "Sensory deprivation tank"

155333121.content:
After some indiscernible amount of time, your unintentional meditation was interrupted by the faint sound of the dinging of a clock. The vixen let out a little sigh, as if disappointed. “Alright, kiddo. Time's up,” she says. While you were sad this had to end, it was good timing; the acid was starting to make your skin itchy. She closed up shop for the night, before once again retreating in the privacy of a back room. “Now, just relax your body and don’t move a muscle. Let me do all the work,” she instructs, leaning forward in front of a padded table. In the next few moments, you feel like your tiny world is turned upside down as her stomach contracts around you, and you repeat your trip down her gullet in reverse.

It wasn’t long before you finally felt your feet squeeze out of the vixen’s throat. As she slid you easily from her maw, your body was, bit by bit, exposed to the cool air of the outside world. Compared to her warm stomach, it was freezing. As you found yourself laying on the hard, rigid table, and you heard the familiar cacophony of background noise, part of you wished you could curl up back in her belly again, where it was warm and quiet. Your eyes slowly adjusted to the light, and you realize you were both naked and covered head to toe in saliva. You try to stand, only for you to suddenly feel lightheaded. “Slow down, there, kiddo. You’re still going to be a little dizzy for a while,” the vixen said, gently sitting you back down, and giving you a towel to cover yourself up with and dry off.

You spent the next couple dozen minutes recuperating on the cold table, as the vixen asks you constant questions about your experience. She didn’t get to do this often, it seems, so she was curious what it was like to be inside her stomach. As you mumbled your answers, you slowly start to ponder what happened to you. Now that you gotten your bearings, your anxiety slowly starts to creep back into your mind. This was insane! This woman just devoured you alive, and not she’s acting like it’s no big deal! Not only that, but you’ve wasted half the day spending God knows how much time lounging in her stomach. A bit panic stricken, you make your excuses and make a move for the exit. To your horror, she steps in front of you, blocking your path. “Ah, ah, ah! You’re not leaving yet. We still have the issue of payment,” she said, and your heart seized up. Payment? You didn’t know there was any payment involved! She ate you and she expects you to pay her? “I’m going to need to speak with your mistress.”

You try to say something -- to come up with some kind of excuse, to make up some lie -- but you just couldn’t bring yourself to say anything. Something about the vixen’s body language told you that you were already busted. She stared you down, her icy gaze feeling like it was piercing your chest. “You do HAVE a mistress, don’t you?” Unable to explain yourself, you reluctantly shook your head, finally admitting the truth. “Hmph. Figured you were lying… but I wanted to give you the benefit of the doubt,” the vixen rolls her eyes., and you realize she had anticipated you being unable to pay. “Seriously. Walking into a small business, trying to steal free service? I had heard that you human males were entitled, but…”

She looks terrifying high above you, showing you her huge maw full of glistening white fangs. You can only freeze in place as you stare down her dark, yawning throat in horror. “Well, we’ll have to settle your debt somehow,” she smirks, toying with you. “Listen. How about I just gulp you down again, and let my stomach churn your tasty body into fat. Then we’ll be even. How does that sound?”

“I-I’m really sorry…” you manage to choke out, as you try not to sob. Your heart feels heavy in your chest. Seeing the tears forming in your eyes, the vixen looks a little guilty and relents.

“Hey, come on. Don’t cry. I’m just messin’ around,” she lightens up, putting a hand on your shoulder. “Tell you what. I’ve always wanted a servant boy to help around the parlor, but they’re just so hard to come by. So just serve as my assistant for a while, make me some money, and eventually we’ll be right as rain. Sound good?” You recoil from her touch, getting ready to flee at any moment; but reluctantly, you nod, and she smiles. “Well that’s just dandy! I’ve been anticipating someone like you for a while. I’ve even got a cute little uniform prepared and everything!” You weren’t nearly so enthused. You’d rather not spend any more time around this crazy vixen than you had to, but you figured she would catch you easily if you tried to run away. All you could do was bide your time and wait for a chance to escape.

Seeing you’re still not comfortable, she takes a knee until the two of your are eyelevel. “Now, it’s getting late,” she says, trying to take on a gentler tone. “You look like you need some rest. You have a big day tomorrow.” She leads you to the back room and, after a moment of hesitation, you follow.

Before you know it, you’re laying back on that very same bed, the sleeping vixen cuddling your side. You were simply staring at the ceiling, thinking about the situation you’ve gotten yourself into. You know that this would probably be a prime opportunity to escape, but feeling the softness of the bed and the warmth of the vixen’s fur, and the you can’t help but feel that same feeling of relaxation start to creep back in. After sleeping in dumpsters and alleyways for the past week, you couldn’t help but enjoy sleeping in an actual bedroom for once. Besides, the ‘isolation tank’ treatment you received had relieved all the tension from your joints, letting you almost melt into the bed. You close your eyes, letting yourself get the best sleep you’ve had in years. You can always escape tomorrow…



───


Today was the first day as the vixen’s assistant. It was a little demeaning being a servant, but you were a little amused by how excited and cheerful your presence seemed to make the vixen. Your ‘uniform’, such as it is, consisted solely of a single oversized red shirt with a logo emblazoned on the front. Pants were not provided, much to your embarrassment. You manned the counter diligently while the vixen worked on something in the back. It was a tad boring, since this post-apocalyptic massage parlor obviously didn’t seem to get much business, but you did relish the opportunity to get some quiet time without having to constantly fear for your life.

Without warning, the first visitor of the day steps through the door, startling you. She is a...

1553331211.content:
You hoped that no customers would come in today, so you cringed when you hear the bell ringing, announcing somebody had stepped through the door. Before you stood and 8-foot tall husky woman; a little smaller than the vixen in proportions, but still almost twice your size in every aspect. “Ah, Mary. Queen working you to the bone again?” the vixen smiled, as if greeting an old friend.

“Ugh, yeah. Setting up the mothership is killer on my back,” the husky sighed, arching her back dramatically. You perked up at this. This woman was involved with the mothership? Maybe she could be persuaded to let you in on some valuable intel. Stepping forward, the canine looked a little stunned when she noticed you. “Uh… Vivi? Who’s this?” She seemed to address the vixen as Vivi, which you surmised was some sort of nickname.

“This is my new little manservant!” the vixen boasted, proudly wrapping an arm around you and showing you off. “He’ll be helping out around the parlor for a few months.”

You don’t know anything about being a masseuse, but something tells you you don’t have any part in this decision.

Before you knew it, you had been shoved into a back room, and the huge canine woman was sprawled out naked on the table before you, laying down on her front, with her tail waving lazily in the air.. You had no idea what you were supposed to be doing. Wasn’t this the vixen’s expertise? You felt awkward just looking at the husky’s bare, voluptuous body. You prodded curiously at her skin for a moment in curiosity, but sensing the woman start to become impatient, you start to do your best to knead and prod her tense muscles, starting with her neck and working you way down her back. The mutated husky woman was so large and her skin so thick, even the gentlest of muscle massages required you to put a bit of force behind it.

You had never really studied one of the aliens up close before. The feeling was uncanny -- she had the soft fur of a husky, but most of her proportions looked and felt distinctly human. Her proportions seemed to diverge from a humans mostly from the neck up; the rest of her body was just about what you’d expect from a particularly beautiful woman, ignoring the fur and tail. Her head was the main point of divergence, with big fluffy ears protruding from the top of her head, and of course, the snout one would expect from a canine. Her eyes were wider than a dog’s, with a smaller iris, and more prominent eyebrows and eyelashes, making her expressions look very human. Despite the uncanny features of her snout, even her face seemed beautiful, in a strange way. You couldn’t quite decide what to make of it all.

“Mhmm…” she confirmed, not bothering to open her eyes.

“What’s that all about?” you ask, and she sighs, sounding a little frustrated by the interruption.

“Right now, the Queen is busy turning the Earth into a global matriarchy. Hence why she granted so many females, of every species, the gift of anthropomorphism,” she explains, lazily. “Once that’s all set up, the mothership will take off again, and the queen will conquer some new planet.”

“W-when will that be?” you ask, taken aback by the sudden revelation.

“I don’t know. Probably in, like, a month or so,” she groans. You were horrified. If the queen left the planet, you would never be able to defeat her. You needed to act quickly… but you were stuck here! Could you tell the vixen about your plan to defeat the queen? No, she would turn you in. You had to find some way to escape. As you pondered this, your thoughts were suddenly interrupted by the husky. “Now get back to work! Enough with the talkin’.”

Your mind still racing, you moved down the canine’s muscular legs. Her feet were probably the strangest part of the alien, being bizarre amalgamations of paws and human feet, boasting soft pads and sharp claws. While you expected this to be the less disgusting part, you were surprised by how terrible her feet smelled in your hands. Don’t dogs sweat through their noses? You had to cover your nose with your shirt while kneading the center of her feet paws with your thumbs. The husky squirmed a little bit, and at times, you swore you could hear her giggling. Eventually, you ran out of ideas for massaging, and figured you had probably done your job. You just wanted to get this over with as fast as possible, anyway, so you could stew on this new information. “Umm… well, that should be it then, miss…” you stutter, not really fully paying attention anymore. “I have some things I need to… think about…”

Before you could walk off, however, the husky blocked your path with one of her long, muscular arms. “Not so fast!” she demanded, a smirk on her face. “You’re not even halfway done yet. I paid for the full service!”

You stare at her, confused. “What does that mean?” you ask.

“It means I’m getting an interior massage, too,” she demanded, rubbing her belly. “Vivi says you’re quite a natural at it, and I want to see if you’re all you’re cracked up to be.”

You gulp, staring at her flat, muscular belly. Oh, come on! You didn't know that was part of the deal! You have to go inside one of these aliens again? You had to admit, that last time was kind of enjoyable, in a weird way… but it’s not something you want to make a habit of! Then again, it might give you some time to think up a plan. “I-If I do that… will you tell me more about the mothership?” you finally negotiate.

“Uh, yeah, sure. Whatever,” she shrugged, no fully understand your request. She leaned back on the table again, smirking at you. “Anyway, hop to it, little human. I need to blow off some steam!”

Judging by her posture, you realize she expects you to climb inside her...
